   20: -module(disk_log_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %%-define(debug, true).
   23: 
   24: -ifdef(debug).
   25: -define(format(S, A), io:format(S, A)).
   26: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   27: -define(privdir(_), "./disk_log_SUITE_priv").
   28: -define(datadir(_), "./disk_log_SUITE_data").
   29: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   30: -else.
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: -define(format(S, A), ok).
   33: -define(privdir(Conf), proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   34: -define(datadir(Conf), proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf)).
   35: -endif.
   36: 
   37: -compile(export_all).
   38: 
   39: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   40: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, 
   41: 
   42: 	 halt_int_inf/1,

   46: 	 wrap_ext_ro/1, halt_trunc/1, halt_misc/1, halt_ro_alog/1, 
   47: 	 halt_ro_balog/1, halt_ro_crash/1,
   48: 
   49: 	 wrap_int_1/1, wrap_int_2/1, inc_wrap_file/1,
   50:

   52:

   54: 
   55: 	 wrap_ext_1/1, wrap_ext_2/1,
   56: 
   57: 	 rotate_1/1, rotate_truncate/1, rotate_reopen/1,
   58:          rotate_breopen/1, next_rotate_file/1,
   59: 
   60: 	 head_func/1, plain_head/1, one_header/1,
   61: 
   62: 	 wrap_notif/1, full_notif/1, trunc_notif/1, blocked_notif/1,
   63: 
   64: 	 new_idx_vsn/1, 
   65: 
   66: 	 reopen/1, 
   67: 
   68: 	 block_blocked/1, block_queue/1, block_queue2/1,
   69: 
   70: 	 unblock/1,
   71: 
   72: 	 open_overwrite/1, open_size/1, open_change_size/1,
   73:          open_truncate/1, open_error/1,
   74: 
   75: 	 close_race/1, close_block/1, close_deadlock/1,
   76: 
   77: 	 error_repair/1, error_log/1, error_index/1,
   78:

  112: %% TODO (old):
  113: %%   - global logs

  119: 
  120: %% These are all tests, the list to be returned by all().
  121: -define(ALL_TESTS,
  122: 	[halt_int, wrap_int, halt_ext, wrap_ext, read_mode, head,
  123: 	 notif, new_idx_vsn, reopen, block, unblock, open, close,
  124: 	 error, chunk, truncate, many_users, info, change_size,
  125: 	 open_change_size, change_attribute, otp_6278, otp_10131,
  126:          otp_16768, otp_16809, rotate]).
  127: 
  128: 
  129: suite() ->
  130:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  131:      {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
  132: 
  133: all() -> 
  134:     [{group, halt_int}, {group, wrap_int},
  135:      {group, halt_ext}, {group, wrap_ext}, {group, rotate},
  136:      {group, read_mode}, {group, head}, {group, notif},
  137:      new_idx_vsn, reopen, {group, block}, unblock,
  138:      {group, open}, {group, close}, {group, error}, chunk,
  139:      truncate, many_users, {group, info},
  140:      {group, change_size}, change_attribute,
  141:      otp_6278, otp_10131, otp_16768, otp_16809].
  142: 
  143: groups() -> 
  144:     [{halt_int, [], [halt_int_inf, {group, halt_int_sz}]},
  145:      {halt_int_sz, [], [halt_int_sz_1, halt_int_sz_2]},
  146:      {read_mode, [],
  147:       [halt_int_ro, halt_ext_ro, wrap_int_ro, wrap_ext_ro,
  148:        halt_trunc, halt_misc, halt_ro_alog, halt_ro_balog,
  149:        halt_ro_crash]},
  150:      {wrap_int, [], [wrap_int_1, wrap_int_2, inc_wrap_file]},
  151:      {halt_ext, [], [halt_ext_inf, {group, halt_ext_sz}]},
  152:      {halt_ext_sz, [], [halt_ext_sz_1, halt_ext_sz_2]},
  153:      {wrap_ext, [], [wrap_ext_1, wrap_ext_2]},
  154:      {rotate, [],
  155:       [rotate_1, rotate_truncate, rotate_reopen,
  156:        rotate_breopen, next_rotate_file]},
  157:      {head, [], [head_func, plain_head, one_header]},
  158:      {notif, [],
  159:       [wrap_notif, full_notif, trunc_notif, blocked_notif]},
  160:      {block, [], [block_blocked, block_queue, block_queue2]},
  161:      {open, [],
  162:       [open_overwrite, open_size, open_change_size, open_truncate,
  163:        open_error]},
  164:      {close, [], [close_race, close_block, close_deadlock]},
  165:      {error, [], [error_repair, error_log, error_index]},
  166:      {info, [], [info_current]},
  167:      {change_size, [],
  168:       [change_size_before, change_size_during,
  169:        change_size_after, default_size, change_size2,
  170:        change_size_truncate]}].
  171: 
  172: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  173:     Config.
  174: 
  175: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  176:     ok.
  177: 
  178: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  179:     Config.
  180: 
  181: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  182:     Config.
  183: 
  184: 
  185: 
  186: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  187:     Config.
  188: 
  189: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
  190:     ok.
  191: 
  192: 
  193: %% Test simple halt disk log, size infinity.
  194: halt_int_inf(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  195:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  196:     ok = disk_log:start(),
  197:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  198:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  199: 			     {format,internal},
  200: 			     {file, File}]),
  201:     simple_log(a),
  202:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  203:     ok = file:delete(File).
  204: 
  205: 
  206: %% Test simple halt disk log, size defined.
  207: halt_int_sz_1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  208:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  209:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  210:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,18000},
  211: 			     {format,internal},
  212: 			     {file, File}]),
  213:     simple_log(a),
  214:     ok = disk_log:truncate(a),
  215:     [] = get_all_terms(a),
  216:     T1 = mk_bytes(10000),
  217:     T2 = mk_bytes(5000),
  218:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  219:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  220: 	[T1] ->
  221: 	    ok;
  222: 	E1 ->
  223: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T1]})
  224:     end,
  225:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T2),
  226:     {error, {full, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  227:     ok = disk_log:alog(a, T1),
  228:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  229: 	[T1, T2] ->
  230: 	    ok;
  231: 	E2 ->
  232: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, [T1, T2]})
  233:     end,
  234:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  235:     ok = file:delete(File).
  236: 
  237: %% Test simple halt disk log, size ~8192.
  238: halt_int_sz_2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  239:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  240:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  241:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  242:     File3 = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
  243:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,8191},
  244: 			     {format,internal},
  245: 			     {file, File1}]),
  246:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {type,halt}, {size,8192},
  247: 			     {format,internal},
  248: 			     {file, File2}]),
  249:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {type,halt}, {size,8193},
  250: 			     {format,internal},
  251: 			     {file, File3}]),
  252:     T1 = mk_bytes(8191-16), % 16 is size of header + magics for 1 item
  253:     T2 = mk_bytes(8192-16),
  254:     T3 = mk_bytes(8193-16),
  255:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  256:     ok = disk_log:log(b, T2),
  257:     ok = disk_log:log(c, T3),
  258:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  259: 	[T1] ->
  260: 	    ok;
  261: 	E1 ->
  262: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T1]})
  263:     end,
  264:     case get_all_terms(b) of
  265: 	[T2] ->
  266: 	    ok;
  267: 	E2 ->
  268: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, [T2]})
  269:     end,
  270:     case get_all_terms(c) of
  271: 	[T3] ->
  272: 	    ok;
  273: 	E3 ->
  274: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E3, [T3]})
  275:     end,
  276:     ok = disk_log:truncate(a),
  277:     ok = disk_log:truncate(b),
  278:     {error, {full, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T2),
  279:     {error, {full, b}} = disk_log:log(b, T3),
  280:     [] = get_all_terms(a),
  281:     [] = get_all_terms(b),
  282:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  283:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  284:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
  285:     ok = file:delete(File1),
  286:     ok = file:delete(File2),
  287:     ok = file:delete(File3),
  288:     ok.
  289: 
  290: 
  291: %% Test simple halt disk log, read only, internal.
  292: halt_int_ro(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  293:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  294:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  295: 
  296:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  297: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  298:     simple_log(a),
  299:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  300: 
  301:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  302: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File},
  303: 			     {mode,read_only}]),
  304:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  305:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  306:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  307:     ok = file:delete(File).
  308: 
  309: %% Test simple halt disk log, read only, external.
  310: halt_ext_ro(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  311:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  312:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  313:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  314: 			     {format,external}, {file, File}]),
  315:     xsimple_log(File, a),
  316:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  317:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  318: 			     {format,external}, {file, File},
  319: 			     {mode,read_only}]),
  320:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  321:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}}  = disk_log:blog(a, T1),
  322:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  323:     ok = file:delete(File).
  324: 
  325: %% Test simple wrap disk log, read only, internal.
  326: wrap_int_ro(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  327:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  328:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  329:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  330: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  331:     simple_log(a),
  332:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  333:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  334: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  335:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  336:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  337:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  338:     del(File, 4).
  339: 
  340: %% Test simple wrap disk log, read only, external.
  341: wrap_ext_ro(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  342:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  343:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  344:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  345: 			     {format,external}, {file, File}]),
  346:     x2simple_log(File ++ ".1", a),
  347:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  348:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  349: 			     {format,external}, {file, File},
  350: 			     {mode,read_only}]),
  351:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  352:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}}  = disk_log:blog(a, T1),
  353:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}}  = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(a),
  354:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  355:     del(File, 4).
  356: 
  357: %% Test truncation of halt disk log.
  358: halt_trunc(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  359:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  360:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  361:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  362: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  363:     simple_log(a),
  364:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  365:     {error,{badarg,repair_read_only}} =
  366: 	disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  367: 		       {repair, truncate}, {format,internal},
  368: 		       {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  369:     ok = file:delete(File).
  370: 
  371: %% Test truncation of halt disk log.
  372: halt_misc(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  373:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  374:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  375:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  376: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  377:     simple_log(a),
  378:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  379:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  380: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File},
  381: 			     {mode,read_only}]),
  382:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  383:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  384:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:sync(a),
  385:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:reopen(a, "b.LOG"),
  386:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} =
  387:         disk_log:change_header(a, {head,header}),
  388:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} =
  389:         disk_log:change_size(a, infinity),
  390:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  391:     ok = file:delete(File).
  392: 
  393: %% Test truncation of halt disk log, read only.
  394: halt_ro_alog(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  395:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  396:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  397:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  398: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  399:     simple_log(a),
  400:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  401:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  402: 			     {notify,true}, {format,internal},
  403: 			     {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  404:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  405:     ok = disk_log:alog(a, T1),
  406:     ok = halt_ro_alog_wait_notify(a, T1),
  407:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  408:     ok = file:delete(File).
  409: 
  410: halt_ro_alog_wait_notify(Log, T) ->
  411:     Term = term_to_binary(T),
  412:     receive
  413: 	{disk_log, _, Log,{read_only, [Term]}} ->
  414: 	    ok;
  415: 	Other ->
  416: 	    Other
  417:     after 5000 ->
  418: 	    failed
  419:     end.
  420: 
  421: %% Test truncation of halt disk log, read only.
  422: halt_ro_balog(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  423:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  424:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  425:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  426: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  427:     simple_log(a),
  428:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  429:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  430: 			     {notify,true}, {format,external},
  431: 			     {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  432:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  433:     ok = disk_log:balog(a, T1),
  434:     ok = halt_ro_balog_wait_notify(a, T1),
  435:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  436:     ok = file:delete(File).
  437: 
  438: halt_ro_balog_wait_notify(Log, T) ->
  439:     Term = list_to_binary(T),
  440:     receive
  441: 	{disk_log, _, Log,{read_only, [Term]}} ->
  442: 	    ok;
  443: 	Other ->
  444: 	    Other
  445:     after 5000 ->
  446: 	    failed
  447:     end.
  448: 
  449: %% Test truncation of halt disk log, read only, repair.
  450: halt_ro_crash(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  451:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  452:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  453: 
  454:     file:delete(File),
  455:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  456: 			     {format,internal},{file, File}]),
  457:     simple_log(a),
  458:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  459:     crash(File, 10),
  460:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  461: 			     {notify,true}, {format,internal},
  462: 			     {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  463: 
  464:     Error1 = {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:truncate(a),
  465:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
  466: 
  467:     %% crash/1 sets the length of the first item to something big (2.5 kb).
  468:     %% In R6B, binary_to_term accepts garbage at the end of the binary,
  469:     %% which means that the first item is recognized!
  470:     %% This is how it was before R6B:
  471:     %% {C1,T1,15} = disk_log:chunk(a,start),
  472:     %% {C2,T2} = disk_log:chunk(a,C1),
  473:     {C1,_OneItem,7476} = disk_log:chunk(a,start),
  474:     {C2, [], 7} = disk_log:chunk(a,C1),
  475:     eof = disk_log:chunk(a,C2),
  476:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  477:     ok = file:delete(File).
  478: 
  479: 
  480: 
  481: 
  482: 
  483: %% Test wrap disk log, internal.
  484: wrap_int_1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  485:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  486:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  487:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  488: 			     {format,internal},
  489: 			     {file, File}]),
  490:     [_] =
  491:         lists:filter(fun(P) -> disk_log:pid2name(P) =/= undefined end, 
  492:                      erlang:processes()),
  493:     simple_log(a),
  494:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  495:     del(File, 4),
  496:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  497: 			     {format,internal},
  498: 			     {file, File}]),
  499:     [] = get_all_terms(a),
  500:     T1 = mk_bytes(10000), % file 2
  501:     T2 = mk_bytes(5000),  % file 3
  502:     T3 = mk_bytes(4000),  % file 4
  503:     T4 = mk_bytes(2000),  % file 4
  504:     T5 = mk_bytes(5000),  % file 1
  505:     T6 = mk_bytes(5000),  % file 2
  506:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  507:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T2),
  508:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T3),
  509:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(a, [T4, T5, T6]),
  510:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  511: 	[T2,T3,T4,T5,T6] ->
  512: 	    ok;
  513: 	E1 ->
  514: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T2,T3,T4,T5,T6]})
  515:     end,
  516:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  517:     del(File, 4).
  518: 
  519: %% Test wrap disk log, internal.
  520: wrap_int_2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  521:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  522:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  523:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  524:     File3 = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
  525:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8191,3}},
  526: 			     {format,internal},
  527: 			     {file, File1}]),
  528:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8192,3}},
  529: 			     {format,internal},
  530: 			     {file, File2}]),
  531:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8193,3}},
  532: 			     {format,internal},
  533: 			     {file, File3}]),
  534:     T1 = mk_bytes(8191-16), % 16 is size of header + magics for 1 item
  535:     T2 = mk_bytes(8192-16),
  536:     T3 = mk_bytes(8193-16),
  537:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  538:     ok = disk_log:log(b, T2),
  539:     ok = disk_log:log(c, T3),
  540:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  541: 	[T1] ->
  542: 	    ok;
  543: 	E1 ->
  544: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T1]})
  545:     end,
  546:     case get_all_terms(b) of
  547: 	[T2] ->
  548: 	    ok;
  549: 	E2 ->
  550: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, [T2]})
  551:     end,
  552:     case get_all_terms(c) of
  553: 	[T3] ->
  554: 	    ok;
  555: 	E3 ->
  556: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E3, [T3]})
  557:     end,
  558:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  559:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  560:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
  561:     del(File1, 3),
  562:     del(File2, 3),
  563:     del(File3, 3).
  564: 
  565: %% Test disk log, force a change to next file.
  566: inc_wrap_file(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  567:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  568:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  569:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  570:     File3 = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
  571: 
  572:     %% Test that halt logs gets an error message
  573:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name, a}, {type, halt},
  574: 			     {format, internal},
  575: 			     {file, File1}]),
  576:     ok = disk_log:log(a, "message one"),
  577:     {error, {halt_log, a}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(a),
  578: 
  579:     %% test an internally formatted wrap log file
  580:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name, b}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,3}},
  581: 			     {format, internal}, {head, 'thisisahead'},
  582: 			     {file, File2}]),
  583:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "message one"),
  584:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(b),
  585:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "message two"),
  586:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(b),
  587:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "message three"),
  588:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(b),
  589:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "message four"),
  590:     T1 = get_all_terms(b),
  591:     ['thisisahead', "message two",
  592:      'thisisahead', "message three",
  593:      'thisisahead', "message four"] = T1,
  594: 
  595:     %% test an externally formatted wrap log file
  596:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name, c}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,3}},
  597: 			     {format,external}, {head,"this is a head "},
  598: 			     {file, File3}]),
  599:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "message one"),
  600:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(c),
  601:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "message two"),
  602:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(c),
  603:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "message three"),
  604:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(c),
  605:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "message four"),
  606:     ok = disk_log:sync(c),
  607:     {ok, Fd31} = file:open(File3 ++ ".1", [read]),
  608:     {ok,"this is a head message four"} = file:read(Fd31, 200),
  609:     {ok, Fd32} = file:open(File3 ++ ".2", [read]),
  610:     {ok,"this is a head message two"} = file:read(Fd32, 200),
  611:     {ok, Fd33} = file:open(File3 ++ ".3", [read]),
  612:     {ok,"this is a head message three"} = file:read(Fd33, 200),
  613:     ok = file:close(Fd31),
  614:     ok = file:close(Fd32),
  615:     ok = file:close(Fd33),
  616: 
  617:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  618:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  619:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
  620:     ok = file:delete(File1),
  621:     del(File2, 3),
  622:     del(File3, 3).
  623: 
  624: 
  625:

  662:     Tmp = T1 ++ T2 ++ T3 ++ T3,

  672: %% Test halt disk log, external, size defined.
  673: halt_ext_sz_2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  674:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  675:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  676:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  677:     File3 = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
  678:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,8191},
  679: 			     {format,external},
  680: 			     {file, File1}]),
  681:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {type,halt}, {size,8192},
  682: 			     {format,external},
  683: 			     {file, File2}]),
  684:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {type,halt}, {size,8193},
  685: 			     {format,external},
  686: 			     {file, File3}]),
  687:     {B1, T1} = x_mk_bytes(8191),
  688:     {B2, T2} = x_mk_bytes(8192),
  689:     {B3, T3} = x_mk_bytes(8193),
  690:     ok = disk_log:blog(a, B1),
  691:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, B2),
  692:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, B3),
  693:     case get_list(File1, a) of
  694: 	T1 ->
  695: 	    ok;
  696: 	E1 ->
  697: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, T1})
  698:     end,
  699:     case get_list(File2, b) of
  700: 	T2 ->
  701: 	    ok;
  702: 	E2 ->
  703: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, T2})
  704:     end,
  705:     case get_list(File3, c) of
  706: 	T3 ->
  707: 	    ok;
  708: 	E3 ->
  709: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E3, T3})
  710:     end,
  711:     ok = disk_log:truncate(a),
  712:     ok = disk_log:truncate(b),
  713:     {error, {full, a}} = disk_log:blog(a, B2),
  714:     Error1 = {error, {full, b}} = disk_log:blog(b, B3),
  715:     "The halt log" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
  716:     true = info(b, full, false),
  717:     [] = get_list(File1, a),
  718:     [] = get_list(File2, b),
  719:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  720:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  721:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
  722:     ok = file:delete(File1),
  723:     ok = file:delete(File2),
  724:     ok = file:delete(File3),
  725:     ok.

  740: 			     {file, File}]),

  743:     {B3, T3} = x_mk_bytes(4000),  % file 4
  744:     {B4, T4} = x_mk_bytes(2000),  % file 4
  745:     {B5, T5} = x_mk_bytes(5000),  % file 1
  746:     {B6, T6} = x_mk_bytes(5000),  % file 2
  747:     ok = disk_log:blog(a, B1),
  748:     ok = disk_log:blog(a, B2),

  750:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(a, [B4, B5, B6]),

  753: 	    ok;

  755: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, T2})
  756:     end,

  759: 	T34 ->
  760: 	    ok;
  761: 	E34 ->
  762: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E34, T34})
  763:     end,

  765: 	T5 ->
  766: 	    ok;
  767: 	E5 ->
  768: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E5, T5})
  769:     end,

  771: 	T6 ->
  772: 	    ok;
  773: 	E6 ->
  774: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E6, T6})
  775:     end,
  776:     ok = disk_log:close(a),

  787: 			     {file, File1}]),

  789: 			     {format,external},
  790: 			     {file, File2}]),

  792: 			     {format,external},
  793: 			     {file, File3}]),

  826: %% Test rotate disk log, external, size defined.
  827: rotate_1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  828:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  829:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  830:     Name = a,
  831:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{8000, 3}},
  832: 			     {format,external},
  833: 			     {file, File}]),
  834:     x2simple_log(File, Name),
  835:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  836:     del_rot_files(File, 4),
  837:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{8000, 3}},
  838: 			     {format,external},
  839: 			     {file, File}]),
  840:     {B1, _T1} = x_mk_bytes(10000), % lost due to rotation 
  841:     {B2, T2} = x_mk_bytes(5000),  % file a.LOG.2.gx 
  842:     {B3, T3} = x_mk_bytes(4000),  % file a.LOG.1.gz 
  843:     {B4, T4} = x_mk_bytes(2000),  % file a.LOG.1.gz
  844:     {B5, T5} = x_mk_bytes(5000),  % file a.LOG.0.gz 
  845:     {B6, T6} = x_mk_bytes(5000),  % in the active file 
  846:     ok = disk_log:blog(Name, B1),
  847:     ok = disk_log:blog(Name, B2),
  848:     ok = disk_log:blog(Name, B3),
  849:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(a, [B4, B5, B6]),
  850:     case get_list(File ++ ".2.gz", Name, rotate) of
  851:         T2 ->
  852:             ok;
  853:         E2 ->
  854:             test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, T2})
  855:     end,
  856:     T34 = T3 ++ T4,
  857:     case get_list(File ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate) of
  858:         T34 ->
  859:             ok;
  860:         E34 ->
  861:             test_server_fail({bad_terms, E34, T34})
  862:     end,
  863:     case get_list(File ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate) of
  864:         T5 ->
  865:             ok;
  866:         E5 ->
  867:             test_server_fail({bad_terms, E5, T5})
  868:     end,
  869:     case get_list(File, Name) of
  870:         T6 ->
  871:             ok;
  872:         E6 ->
  873:             test_server_fail({bad_terms, E6, T6})
  874:     end,
  875:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  876:     del_rot_files(File, 3).
  877: 
  878: %% test truncate/1 for rotate logs
  879: rotate_truncate(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  880:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  881:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  882:     Name = a,
  883:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{100, 3}},
  884: 			     {format,external},
  885: 			     {file, File}]),
  886:     B = mk_bytes(60),
  887:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Name, [B, B, B]),
  888:     B = get_list(File, Name),
  889:     B = get_list(File ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  890:     B = get_list(File ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  891:     ok = disk_log:truncate(Name),
  892:     [] = get_list(File, Name),
  893:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File ++ ".0.gz"),
  894:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File ++ ".1.gz"),
  895:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  896:     file:delete(File).
  897: 
  898: %% test reopen/2 for rotate logs
  899: rotate_reopen(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  900:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  901:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  902:     Name = a,
  903:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{100, 3}},
  904: 			     {format,external},
  905: 			     {file, File}]),
  906:     B = mk_bytes(60),
  907:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Name, [B, B, B]),
  908:     B = get_list(File, Name),
  909:     B = get_list(File ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  910:     B = get_list(File ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  911:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  912:     ok = disk_log:reopen(Name, File1),
  913:     [] = get_list(File, Name),
  914:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File ++ ".0.gz"),
  915:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File ++ ".1.gz"),
  916:     B = get_list(File1 ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  917:     B = get_list(File1 ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  918:     B = get_list(File1 ++ ".2.gz", Name, rotate),
  919:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  920:     file:delete(File),
  921:     del_rot_files(File1, 3).
  922: 
  923: %% test breopen/3 for rotate logs
  924: rotate_breopen(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  925:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  926:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  927:     Name = a,
  928:     Head1 = "thisishead1",
  929:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{100, 3}},
  930: 			     {format,external},
  931:                              {head, Head1},
  932: 			     {file, File1}]),
  933:     B = mk_bytes(60),
  934:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Name, [B, B, B]),
  935:     FileCont = Head1 ++ B,
  936:     FileCont = get_list(File1, Name),
  937:     FileCont = get_list(File1 ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  938:     FileCont = get_list(File1 ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  939:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  940:     Head2 = "thisishead2",
  941:     ok = disk_log:breopen(Name, File2, Head2),
  942:     Head2 = get_list(File1, Name),
  943:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File1 ++ ".0.gz"),
  944:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File1 ++ ".1.gz"),
  945:     FileCont = get_list(File2 ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  946:     FileCont = get_list(File2 ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  947:     FileCont = get_list(File2 ++ ".2.gz", Name, rotate),
  948:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  949:     file:delete(File1),
  950:     del_rot_files(File2, 3).
  951: 
  952: %% Test rotate log, force a change to next file.
  953: next_rotate_file(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  954:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  955:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  956:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  957: 
  958:     %% Test that halt and wrap logs get error messages
  959:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name, a}, {type, halt},
  960: 			     {format, internal},
  961: 			     {file, File1}]),
  962:     ok = disk_log:log(a, "message one"),
  963:     {error, {halt_log, a}} = disk_log:next_file(a),
  964: 
  965:     %% test a rotate log file
  966:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name, b}, {type, rotate}, {size, {100,3}},
  967: 			     {format,external},
  968: 			     {file, File2}]),
  969:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, "message one"),
  970:     ok = disk_log:next_file(b),
  971:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, "message two"),
  972:     ok = disk_log:next_file(b),
  973:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, "message three"),
  974:     ok = disk_log:next_file(b),
  975:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, "message four"),
  976:     ok = disk_log:sync(b),
  977:     "message one" = get_list(File2 ++ ".2.gz", b, rotate),
  978:     "message two" = get_list(File2 ++ ".1.gz", b, rotate),
  979:     "message three" = get_list(File2 ++ ".0.gz", b, rotate),
  980:     "message four" = get_list(File2, b),
  981:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  982:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  983:     ok = file:delete(File1),
  984:     del_rot_files(File2, 3).
  985: 
  986: simple_log(Log) ->
  987:     T1 = "hej",
  988:     T2 = hopp,
  989:     T3 = {tjena, 12},
  990:     T4 = mk_bytes(10000),
  991:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, T1),
  992:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(Log, [T2, T3]),
  993:     case get_all_terms(Log) of
  994: 	[T1, T2, T3] ->
  995: 	    ok;
  996: 	E1 ->
  997: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T1, T2, T3]})
  998:     end,
  999:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T4),
 1000:     case get_all_terms(Log) of
 1001: 	[T1, T2, T3, T4] ->
 1002: 	    ok;
 1003: 	E2 ->
 1004: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, [T1, T2, T3, T4]})
 1005:     end.
 1006: 
 1007: xsimple_log(File, Log) ->
 1008:     T1 = "hej",
 1009:     T2 = list_to_binary("hopp"),
 1010:     T3 = list_to_binary(["sena", list_to_binary("sejer")]),
 1011:     T4 = list_to_binary(By = mk_bytes(10000)),
 1012:     ok = disk_log:blog(Log, T1),
 1013:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Log, [T2, T3]),
 1014:     X = "hejhoppsenasejer",
 1015:     X2 = get_list(File, Log),
 1016:     case X2 of
 1017: 	X -> ok;
 1018: 	Z1 -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z1, X2})
 1019:     end,
 1020:     ok = disk_log:blog(Log, T4),
 1021:     Tmp = get_list(File, Log),
 1022:     case X ++ By of
 1023: 	Tmp -> ok;
 1024: 	Z2 -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z2, X ++ By})
 1025:     end.
 1026: 
 1027: x2simple_log(File, Log) ->
 1028:     T1 = "hej",
 1029:     T2 = list_to_binary("hopp"),
 1030:     T3 = list_to_binary(["sena", list_to_binary("sejer")]),
 1031:     T4 = list_to_binary(By = mk_bytes(1000)),
 1032:     ok = disk_log:blog(Log, T1),
 1033:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Log, [T2, T3]),
 1034:     X = "hejhoppsenasejer",
 1035:     X2 = get_list(File, Log),
 1036:     case X2 of
 1037: 	X -> ok;
 1038: 	Z1 -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z1, X2})
 1039:     end,
 1040:     ok = disk_log:blog(Log, T4),
 1041:     Tmp = get_list(File, Log),
 1042:     case X ++ By of
 1043: 	Tmp -> ok;
 1044: 	Z2 -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z2, X ++ By})
 1045:     end.
 1046: 
 1047: x_mk_bytes(N) ->
 1048:     X = lists:duplicate(N, $a),
 1049:     {list_to_binary(X), X}.
 1050: 
 1051: mk_bytes(N) when N > 4 ->
 1052:     X = lists:duplicate(N-4, $a),
 1053:     case byte_size(term_to_binary(X)) of
 1054:         N -> X;
 1055:         Z -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z, N})
 1056:     end.
 1057: 
 1058: get_list(File, Log) ->
 1059:     ct:pal(?HI_VERBOSITY, "File ~p~n", [File]),
 1060:     ok = disk_log:sync(Log),
 1061:     {ok, B} = file:read_file(File),
 1062:     binary_to_list(B).
 1063: 
 1064: get_list(File, Log, rotate) ->
 1065:     ct:pal(?HI_VERBOSITY, "File ~p~n", [File]),
 1066:     ok = disk_log:sync(Log),
 1067:     DFile = filename:rootname(File,".gz"),
 1068:     decompress_file(File, DFile),
 1069:     {ok, B} = file:read_file(DFile),
 1070:     file:delete(DFile),
 1071:     binary_to_list(B).
 1072: 
 1073: decompress_file(FileName, DFileName) ->
 1074:     {ok,In} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary]),
 1075:     {ok,Out} = file:open(DFileName,[write]),
 1076:     Z = zlib:open(),
 1077:     zlib:inflateInit(Z, 31),
 1078:     decompress_data(Z,In,Out),
 1079:     zlib:inflateEnd(Z),
 1080:     zlib:close(Z),
 1081:     _ = file:close(In),
 1082:     _ = file:close(Out),
 1083:     ok.
 1084: 
 1085: decompress_data(Z,In,Out) ->
 1086:     case file:read(In,1000) of
 1087:         {ok,Data} ->
 1088:             Decompressed = zlib:inflate(Z, Data),
 1089:             _ = file:write(Out,Decompressed),
 1090:             decompress_data(Z,In,Out);
 1091:         eof ->
 1092:             ok
 1093:     end.
 1094: 
 1095: 
 1096: get_all_terms(Log, File, Type) ->
 1097:     {ok, _Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log}, {type,Type}, {size,infinity},
 1098: 				{format,internal}, {file, File},
 1099: 				{mode, read_only}]),
 1100:     Ts = get_all_terms(Log),
 1101:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 1102:     Ts.
 1103: 
 1104: get_all_terms(Log) ->
 1105:     get_all_terms1(Log, start, []).
 1106: 
 1107: get_all_terms1(Log, Cont, Res) ->
 1108:     case disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont) of
 1109: 	{error, _R} ->
 1110: 	    test_server_fail({bad_chunk, Log, Cont});
 1111: 	{Cont2, Terms} ->
 1112: 	    get_all_terms1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ Terms);
 1113: 	eof ->
 1114: 	    Res
 1115:     end.
 1116: 
 1117: get_all_terms_and_bad(Log, File, Type) ->
 1118:     {ok, _Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log}, {type,Type}, {size,infinity},
 1119: 				{format,internal}, {file, File},
 1120: 				{mode, read_only}]),
 1121:     Ts = get_all_terms_and_bad(Log),
 1122:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 1123:     Ts.
 1124: 
 1125: get_all_terms_and_bad(Log) ->
 1126:     read_only = info(Log, mode, foo),
 1127:     get_all_terms_and_bad1(Log, start, [], 0).
 1128: 
 1129: %% 
 1130: get_all_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont, Res, Bad0) ->
 1131:     case disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont) of
 1132: 	{Cont2, Terms} ->
 1133: 	    get_all_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ Terms, Bad0);
 1134: 	{Cont2, Terms, Bad} ->
 1135: 	    get_all_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ Terms, Bad0+Bad);
 1136: 	eof ->
 1137: 	    {Res, Bad0}
 1138:     end.
 1139: 
 1140: get_all_binary_terms_and_bad(Log, File, Type) ->
 1141:     {ok, _Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log}, {type,Type}, {size,infinity},
 1142: 				{format,internal}, {file, File},
 1143: 				{mode, read_only}]),
 1144:     Ts = get_all_binary_terms_and_bad(Log),
 1145:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 1146:     Ts.
 1147: 
 1148: get_all_binary_terms_and_bad(Log) ->
 1149:     read_only = info(Log, mode, foo),
 1150:     get_all_binary_terms_and_bad1(Log, start, [], 0).
 1151: 
 1152: %% 
 1153: get_all_binary_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont, Res, Bad0) ->
 1154:     case disk_log:bchunk(Log, Cont) of
 1155: 	{Cont2, BinTerms} ->
 1156: 	    get_all_binary_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ BinTerms, Bad0);
 1157: 	{Cont2, BinTerms, Bad} ->
 1158: 	    get_all_binary_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ BinTerms, 
 1159:                                           Bad0+Bad);
 1160: 	eof ->
 1161: 	    {Res, Bad0}
 1162:     end.
 1163: 
 1164: del(File, 0) ->
 1165:     file:delete(File ++ ".siz"),
 1166:     file:delete(File ++ ".idx");
 1167: del(File, N) ->
 1168:     file:delete(File ++ "." ++ integer_to_list(N)),
 1169:     del(File, N-1).
 1170: 
 1171: del_rot_files(File, 0) ->
 1172:     file:delete(File ++ ".0.gz"),
 1173:     file:delete(File);
 1174: del_rot_files(File, N) ->
 1175:     file:delete(File ++ "." ++ integer_to_list(N) ++ ".gz"),
 1176:     del_rot_files(File, N-1).
 1177: 
 1178: test_server_fail(R) ->
 1179:     exit({?MODULE, get(line), R}).
 1180: 
 1181: xx() ->
 1182:     File = "a.LOG",
 1183:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 1184: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
 1185:     W = xwr(a, 400),
 1186:     disk_log:close(a),
 1187:     %%    file:delete(File),
 1188:     W.
 1189: 
 1190: %% old: 6150
 1191: %% new: 5910
 1192: xwr(Log, BytesItem) ->
 1193:     NoW = 1000,
 1194:     Item1 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1195:     Item2 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1196:     Item3 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1197:     Item4 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1198:     Item5 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1199:     Item6 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1200:     Item7 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1201:     Item8 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1202:     Item9 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1203:     Item0 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1204:     Term = [Item1,Item2,Item3,Item4,Item5,Item6,Item7,Item8,Item9,Item0],
 1205:     {W, _} = timer:tc(?MODULE, wr, [Log, Term, NoW]),
 1206:     W/NoW.
 1207: 
 1208: measure() ->
 1209:     proc_lib:start_link(?MODULE, init_m, [self()]).
 1210: 
 1211: init_m(Par) ->
 1212:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1213:     Res = m(),
 1214:     proc_lib:init_ack(Par, Res).
 1215: 
 1216: m() ->
 1217:     {W10, R10, Rep10, C10} = m_halt_int(10),
 1218:     {W11, R11, Rep11, C11} = m_halt_int(100),
 1219:     {W12, R12, Rep12, C12} = m_halt_int(400),
 1220:     {W13, R13, Rep13, C13} = m_halt_int(1000),
 1221:     {W14, R14, Rep14, C14} = m_halt_int(10000),
 1222:     {W2, R2, Rep2, C2} = m_wrap_int(400),
 1223:     {W3, R3, Rep3, C3} = m_many_halt_int(10, 400),
 1224:     {W4, R4, Rep4, C4} = m_many_halt_int(20, 400),
 1225:     {W5, R5, Rep5, C5} = m_many_halt_int(10, 1000),
 1226:     {W6, R6, Rep6, C6} = m_many_halt_int(10, 10),
 1227:     {W7, R7, Rep7, C7} = m_many_halt_int(20, 10),
 1228: 
 1229:     io:format("Type of log            mysec/write  mysec/read"
 1230: 	      "  mysec/repair byte  cpu/write\n"),
 1231:     io:format("===========            ===========  =========="
 1232: 	      "  =================  =========\n"),
 1233:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10)", W10, R10, Rep10, C10),
 1234:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (100)", W11, R11, Rep11, C11),
 1235:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (400)", W12, R12, Rep12, C12),
 1236:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (1000)", W13, R13, Rep13, C13),
 1237:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10000)", W14, R14, Rep14, C14),
 1238:     one_line("wrap,int.  4. (400)", W2, R2, Rep2, C2),
 1239:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10,10)", W6, R6, Rep6, C6),
 1240:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (20,10)", W7, R7, Rep7, C7),
 1241:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10,400)", W3, R3, Rep3, C3),
 1242:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (20,400)", W4, R4, Rep4, C4),
 1243:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10,1000)", W5, R5, Rep5, C5),
 1244:     io:format("\n"),
 1245:     io:format("\tWrap log time depends on how often the log wraps, as this\n"),
 1246:     io:format("\tinvolves opening of new files, which costs a lot."),
 1247:     io:format("\n").
 1248: 
 1249: one_line(Txt, W, R, Rep, C) ->
 1250:     io:format("~.22s  ~.10w  ~.10w  ~.17w  ~.9w\n", [Txt, W, R, Rep, C]).
 1251: 
 1252: m_halt_int(BytesItem) ->
 1253:     File = "a.LOG",
 1254:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 1255: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
 1256:     {T,W} = wr(a, BytesItem),
 1257:     R = r(a),
 1258:     [{_,P}] = ets:lookup(?DISK_LOG_NAME_TABLE, a),
 1259:     exit(P, kill),
 1260:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1261:     crash(File, 10),
 1262:     Sz = file_size(File),
 1263:     Start = start_times(),
 1264:     {repaired, a, {recovered, Rec}, {badbytes, Bad}} = 
 1265: 	disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 1266: 		       {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
 1267:     {_,Rep} = end_times(Start),
 1268:     io:format("m_halt_int: Rep = ~p, Rec = ~p, Bad = ~p~n", [Rep, Rec, Bad]),
 1269:     disk_log:close(a),
 1270:     file:delete(File),
 1271:     {W,R,1000*Rep/Sz,T}.
 1272: 
 1273: m_wrap_int(BytesItem) ->
 1274:     File = "a.LOG",
 1275:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{405*1000, 4}},
 1276: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
 1277:     {T,W} = wr(a, BytesItem),
 1278:     R = r(a),
 1279:     [{_,P}] = ets:lookup(?DISK_LOG_NAME_TABLE, a),
 1280:     exit(P, kill),
 1281:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1282:     del(File, 4),
 1283:     {W,R,'n/a',T}.
 1284: 
 1285: m_many_halt_int(NoClients, BytesItem) ->
 1286:     Name = 'log.LOG',
 1287:     File = "log.LOG",
 1288:     {ok, _} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, 
 1289: 			     {size,infinity},
 1290: 			     {format,internal}, {file,File}]),
 1291:     NoW = round(lists:max([lists:min([5000000/BytesItem/NoClients,
 1292: 				      50000/NoClients]),
 1293: 			   1000])),
 1294:     {T,W} = many_wr(NoClients, Name, NoW, BytesItem),
 1295:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
 1296:     file:delete(File),
 1297:     {1000*W/NoW/NoClients,'n/a','n/a',1000*T/NoW/NoClients}.
 1298: 
 1299: many_wr(NoClients, Log, NoW, BytesItem) ->
 1300:     Item = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1301:     Fun = fun(Name, _Pid, _I) -> disk_log:log(Name, Item) end,
 1302:     Start = start_times(),
 1303:     Pids = spawn_clients(NoClients, client, [self(), Log, NoW, Fun]),
 1304:     check_clients(Pids),
 1305:     end_times(Start).
 1306: 
 1307: wr(Log, BytesItem) ->
 1308:     NoW = round(lists:max([lists:min([5000000/BytesItem,50000]),1000])),
 1309:     Item = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1310:     Start = start_times(),
 1311:     wr(Log, Item, NoW),
 1312:     {T,W} = end_times(Start),
 1313:     {1000*T/NoW, 1000*W/NoW}.
 1314: 
 1315: wr(Log, _Item, 0) ->
 1316:     disk_log:sync(Log),
 1317:     ok;
 1318: wr(Log, Item, N) ->
 1319:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, Item),
 1320:     wr(Log, Item, N-1).
 1321: 
 1322: r(_) ->
 1323:     nyi.
 1324: 
 1325: start_times() ->
 1326:     {T1, _} = statistics(runtime),
 1327:     {W1, _} = statistics(wall_clock),
 1328:     {T1, W1}.
 1329: 
 1330: end_times({T1,W1}) ->
 1331:     {T2, _} = statistics(runtime),
 1332:     {W2, _} = statistics(wall_clock),
 1333:     {T2-T1, W2-W1}.
 1334: 
 1335: 
 1336: %% Test head parameter.
 1337: head_func(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1338:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1339:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1340:     ets:new(xxx, [named_table, set, public]),
 1341:     ets:insert(xxx, {wrapc, 0}),
 1342:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1343: 			     {size, {100,4}},
 1344: 			     {head_func, {?MODULE, hf, []}}]),
 1345:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1346:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1347:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1348:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1349:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1350:     H = [1,2,3],
 1351:     [{wrapc, 4}] = ets:lookup(xxx, wrapc),
 1352:     ets:delete(xxx),
 1353:     case get_all_terms(a) of
 1354: 	[H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B] ->
 1355: 	    ok;
 1356: 	E1 ->
 1357: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1,
 1358: 			      [H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B]})
 1359:     end,
 1360:     8  = no_written_items(a),
 1361:     disk_log:close(a),
 1362:     del(File, 4),
 1363: 
 1364:     %% invalid header function
 1365:     {error, {invalid_header, {_, {term}}}} =
 1366: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1367: 		       {format, external},
 1368: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{term}]}}]),
 1369:     file:delete(File),
 1370: 
 1371:     {error, {invalid_header, _}} =
 1372: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1373: 		       {format, external},
 1374: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,{term}}]}}]),
 1375:     file:delete(File),
 1376: 
 1377:     {ok,n} =
 1378: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1379: 		       {format, external},
 1380: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,<<"head">>}]}}]),
 1381:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1382:     {ok,<<"head">>} = file:read_file(File),
 1383:     file:delete(File),
 1384: 
 1385:     {ok,n} =
 1386: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1387: 		       {format, external},
 1388: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head"}]}}]),
 1389:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1390:     {ok,<<"head">>} = file:read_file(File),
 1391:     file:delete(File),
 1392: 
 1393:     Error1 = {error, {badarg, _}} =
 1394: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1395: 		       {head_func, {tjo,hej,san}},{size, {100, 4}}]),
 1396:     "The argument " ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1397: 
 1398:     Error2 = {error, {invalid_header, _}} =
 1399: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1400: 		       {head_func, {tjo,hej,[san]}}]),
 1401:     "The disk log header" ++ _ = format_error(Error2),
 1402:     file:delete(File).
 1403: 
 1404: 
 1405: head_fun(H) ->
 1406:     H.
 1407: 
 1408: hf() ->
 1409:     ets:update_counter(xxx, wrapc, 1),
 1410:     {ok, [1,2,3]}.
 1411: 
 1412: %% Test head parameter.
 1413: plain_head(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1414:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1415:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1416:     H = [1,2,3],
 1417:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1418: 			     {size, {100,4}}, {head, H}]),
 1419:     %% This one is not "counted".
 1420:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1421: 			     {size, {100,4}}, {head, H}]),
 1422:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1423:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1424:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1425:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1426:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1427:     case get_all_terms(a) of
 1428: 	[H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B] ->
 1429: 	    ok;
 1430: 	E1 ->
 1431: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1,
 1432: 			      [H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B]})
 1433:     end,
 1434:     8 = no_written_items(a),
 1435:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
 1436:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:close(a),
 1437:     del(File, 4).
 1438:

 1440: 
 1441: %% Test that a header is just printed once in a log file.
 1442: one_header(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1443:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1444:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1445:     H = [1,2,3],
 1446:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1447: 			     {size, {100,4}}, {head, H}]),
 1448:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1449:     ok = disk_log:log(a, B),
 1450:     ok = disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1451:     ok = disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1452:     ok = disk_log:log(a, B),
 1453:     case get_all_terms(a) of
 1454: 	[H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B] ->
 1455: 	    ok;
 1456: 	E1 ->
 1457: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1,
 1458: 			      [H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B]})
 1459:     end,
 1460:     8  = no_written_items(a),
 1461:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
 1462:     del(File, 4),
 1463: 
 1464:     Fileb = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
 1465:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {file, Fileb}, {head, H}]),
 1466:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
 1467:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {file, Fileb}, {head, H}]),
 1468:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "first log"),
 1469:     ok = disk_log:alog(b, "second log"),
 1470:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
 1471:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {file, Fileb}, {head, H}]),
 1472:     ok = disk_log:alog(b, "3rd log"),
 1473:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "4th log"),
 1474:     case get_all_terms(b) of
 1475: 	[H, "first log", "second log", "3rd log", "4th log"] ->
 1476: 	    ok;
 1477: 	E2 ->
 1478: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2,
 1479: 			      [H, "first log", "second log",
 1480: 			       "3rd log", "4th log"]})
 1481:     end,
 1482:     2  = no_written_items(b),
 1483:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
 1484:     ok = file:delete(Fileb),
 1485: 
 1486:     Filec = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
 1487:     H2 = "this is a header ",
 1488:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {format, external},
 1489: 			     {file, Filec}, {head, H2}]),
 1490:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
 1491:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {format, external},
 1492: 			     {file, Filec}, {head, H2}]),
 1493:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "first log"),
 1494:     ok = disk_log:balog(c, "second log"),
 1495:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
 1496:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {format, external},
 1497: 			     {file, Filec}, {head, H2}]),
 1498:     ok = disk_log:balog(c, "3rd log"),
 1499:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "4th log"),
 1500:     ok = disk_log:sync(c),
 1501:     {ok, Fdc} = file:open(Filec, [read]),
 1502:     {ok,"this is a header first logsecond log3rd log4th log"} =
 1503: 	file:read(Fdc, 200),
 1504:     ok = file:close(Fdc),
 1505:     2  = no_written_items(c),
 1506:     disk_log:close(c),
 1507:     ok = file:delete(Filec),
 1508:     ok.
 1509: 
 1510: 
 1511: 
 1512: %% Test notify parameter, wrap.
 1513: wrap_notif(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1514:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1515:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1516:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1517: 			     {size, {100,4}}, {notify, true}]),
 1518:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1519:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1520:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1521:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1522:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1523:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1524:     rec(3, {disk_log, node(), a, {wrap, 0}}),
 1525:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), a, {wrap, 1}}),
 1526:     disk_log:close(a),
 1527:     del(File, 4).
 1528: 
 1529: %% Test notify parameter, wrap, filled file.
 1530: full_notif(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1531:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1532:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1533:     file:delete(File),
 1534: 
 1535:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name, a}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1536: 			     {size, 100}, {notify, true}]),
 1537:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1538:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1539:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1540:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), a, full}),
 1541:     disk_log:close(a),
 1542:     file:delete(File).
 1543: 
 1544: %% Test notify parameter, wrap, truncated file.
 1545: trunc_notif(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1546:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1547:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1548:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "a.DUMP"),
 1549:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name, a}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1550: 			     {size, 100}, {notify, true}]),
 1551:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1552:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1553:     disk_log:truncate(a),
 1554:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), a, {truncated, 1}}),
 1555:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1556:     ok = disk_log:reopen(a, File2),
 1557:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), a, {truncated, 1}}),
 1558:     disk_log:close(a),
 1559:     file:delete(File),
 1560:     file:delete(File2).
 1561: 
 1562: %% Test notify parameters 'format_external' and 'blocked_log.
 1563: blocked_notif(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1564:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1565:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1566:     No = 4,
 1567:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1568: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 1569: 			     {format, external}]),
 1570:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1571:     Error1 = {error,{format_external,n}} = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1572:     "The requested operation" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1573:     ok = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1574:     ok = disk_log:alog(n, B),
 1575:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {format_external, [term_to_binary(B)]}}),
 1576:     ok = disk_log:alog_terms(n, [B,B,B,B]),
 1577:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {format_external,
 1578: 				  lists:map(fun term_to_binary/1, [B,B,B,B])}}),
 1579:     ok = disk_log:block(n, false),
 1580:     ok = disk_log:alog(n, B),
 1581:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {blocked_log, [term_to_binary(B)]}}),
 1582:     ok = disk_log:balog(n, B),
 1583:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {blocked_log, [list_to_binary(B)]}}),
 1584:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [B,B,B,B]),
 1585:     disk_log:close(n),
 1586:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {blocked_log,
 1587: 				  lists:map(fun list_to_binary/1, [B,B,B,B])}}),
 1588:     del(File, No).
 1589: 
 1590: 
 1591: %% Test the new version of the .idx file.
 1592: new_idx_vsn(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1593:     DataDir = ?datadir(Conf),
 1594:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1595:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "new_vsn.LOG"),
 1596:     Kurt = filename:join(PrivDir, "kurt.LOG"),
 1597:     Kurt2 = filename:join(PrivDir, "kurt2.LOG"),
 1598: 
 1599:     %% Test that a wrap log file can have more than 255 files
 1600:     {ok, new_vsn} = disk_log:open([{file, File}, {name, new_vsn},
 1601: 				   {type, wrap}, {size, {40, 270}}]),
 1602:     ok = log(new_vsn, 280),
 1603:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(add_ext(File, "idx")),
 1604:     <<0,0:32,2,10:32,1:64,1:64,_/binary>> = Bin,
 1605:     disk_log:close(new_vsn),
 1606:     del(File, 270),
 1607: 
 1608:     %% convert a very old version (0) of wrap log file to the new format (2)
 1609:     copy_wrap_log("kurt.LOG", 4, DataDir, PrivDir),
 1610: 
 1611:     {repaired, kurt, {recovered, 1}, {badbytes, 0}} =
 1612: 	disk_log:open([{file, Kurt}, {name, kurt}, 
 1613: 		       {type, wrap}, {size, {40, 4}}]),
 1614:     ok = disk_log:log(kurt, "this is a logged message number X"),
 1615:     ok = disk_log:log(kurt, "this is a logged message number Y"),
 1616:     {ok, BinK} = file:read_file(add_ext(Kurt, "idx")),
 1617:     <<0,0:32,2,2:32,1:64,1:64,1:64,1:64>> = BinK,
 1618:     {{40,4}, 2} = disk_log_1:read_size_file_version(Kurt),
 1619:     disk_log:close(kurt),
 1620:     del(Kurt, 4),
 1621: 
 1622:     %% keep the old format (1)
 1623:     copy_wrap_log("kurt2.LOG", 4, DataDir, PrivDir),
 1624: 
 1625:     {repaired, kurt2, {recovered, 1}, {badbytes, 0}} =
 1626: 	disk_log:open([{file, Kurt2}, {name, kurt2}, 
 1627: 		       {type, wrap}, {size, {40, 4}}]),
 1628:     ok = disk_log:log(kurt2, "this is a logged message number X"),
 1629:     ok = disk_log:log(kurt2, "this is a logged message number Y"),
 1630:     {ok, BinK2} = file:read_file(add_ext(Kurt2, "idx")),
 1631:     <<0,2:32,1:32,1:32,1:32,1:32>> = BinK2,
 1632:     {{40,4}, 1} = disk_log_1:read_size_file_version(Kurt2),
 1633:     disk_log:close(kurt2),
 1634:     del(Kurt2, 4),
 1635: 
 1636:     ok.
 1637: 
 1638: %% Test reopen/1 on halt and wrap logs.
 1639: reopen(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1640: 
 1641:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1642:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1643:     NewFile = filename:join(Dir, "nn.LOG"),
 1644:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1645: 
 1646:     file:delete(File),    % cleanup
 1647:     file:delete(NewFile), % cleanup
 1648:     Q = qlen(),
 1649: 
 1650:     %% External halt log.
 1651:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1652: 			     {notify, true}, {head, "header"},
 1653: 			     {size, infinity},{format, external}]),
 1654:     ok = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1655:     ok = disk_log:breopen(n, NewFile, "head"),
 1656:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 2}}),
 1657:     ok = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1658:     ok = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1659:     ok = disk_log:breopen(n, NewFile, "head"),
 1660:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 3}}),
 1661:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1662:     {ok,BinaryFile} = file:read_file(File),
 1663:     "head" = binary_to_list(BinaryFile),
 1664:     file:delete(File),
 1665:     file:delete(NewFile),
 1666: 
 1667:     %% Internal halt log.
 1668:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1669: 			     {notify, true}, {head, header},
 1670: 			     {size, infinity}]),
 1671:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1672:     Error1 = {error, {same_file_name, n}} = disk_log:reopen(n, File),
 1673:     "Current and new" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1674:     ok = disk_log:reopen(n, NewFile),
 1675:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 2}}),
 1676:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1677:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1678:     ok = disk_log:reopen(n, NewFile),
 1679:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 3}}),
 1680:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1681:     [header, _B, _B] = get_all_terms(nn, NewFile, halt),
 1682:     file:delete(File),
 1683:     file:delete(NewFile),
 1684: 
 1685:     %% Internal wrap log.
 1686:     No = 4,
 1687:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 1688:     del(NewFile, No),	% cleanup
 1689: 
 1690:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1691: 			     {notify, true},
 1692: 			     {head, header}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 1693:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1694:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 1695:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 1696:     rec(3, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 1697:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B]),
 1698:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 2}}),
 1699:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B]),
 1700:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 2}}),
 1701:     ok = disk_log:reopen(n, NewFile, new_header),
 1702:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 8}}),
 1703:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B]),
 1704:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 1705:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B]),
 1706:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 1707:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1708:     [header, _, header, _, header, _, header, _] =
 1709: 	get_all_terms(nn, NewFile, wrap),
 1710:     [new_header, _, header, _, header, _] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 1711: 
 1712:     del(NewFile, No),
 1713:     file:delete(File ++ ".2"),
 1714:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1715: 			     {notify, true},
 1716: 			     {head, header}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 1717:     %% One file is missing...
 1718:     ok = disk_log:reopen(n, NewFile),
 1719:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 6}}),
 1720:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1721: 
 1722:     del(File, No),
 1723:     del(NewFile, No),
 1724:     Q = qlen(),
 1725:     ok.
 1726:

 1728: %% Test block/1 on external and internal logs.
 1729: block_blocked(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1730: 
 1731:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1732:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1733:     Halt = join(Dir, "halt.LOG"),
 1734: 
 1735:     %% External logs.
 1736:     file:delete(Halt), % cleanup
 1737:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt},
 1738: 				{format, external}, {file, Halt}]),
 1739:     ok = disk_log:sync(halt),
 1740:     ok = disk_log:block(halt, false),
 1741:     Error1 = {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:block(halt),
 1742:     "The blocked disk" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1743:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:sync(halt),
 1744:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:truncate(halt),
 1745:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:change_size(halt, infinity),
 1746:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} =
 1747:         disk_log:change_notify(halt, self(), false),
 1748:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} =
 1749:         disk_log:change_header(halt, {head, header}),
 1750:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:reopen(halt, "foo"),
 1751:     ok = disk_log:close(halt),
 1752: 
 1753:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt},
 1754: 				{format, external}]),
 1755:     ok = disk_log:sync(halt),
 1756:     ok = disk_log:block(halt, true),
 1757:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:blog(halt, B),
 1758:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:blog(halt, B),
 1759:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:block(halt),
 1760:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:sync(halt),
 1761:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:truncate(halt),
 1762:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:change_size(halt, infinity),
 1763:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} =
 1764:         disk_log:change_notify(halt, self(), false),
 1765:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} =
 1766:         disk_log:change_header(halt, {head, header}),
 1767:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:reopen(halt, "foo"),
 1768: 
 1769:     ok = disk_log:unblock(halt),
 1770:     ok = disk_log:close(halt),
 1771:     file:delete(Halt),
 1772: 
 1773:     %% Internal logs.
 1774:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1775:     No = 4,
 1776:     del(File, No), % cleanup
 1777:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1778: 				{size, {100, No}}]),
 1779:     ok = disk_log:block(halt, true),
 1780:     eof = disk_log:chunk(halt, start),
 1781:     Error2 = {error, end_of_log} = disk_log:chunk_step(halt, start, 1),
 1782:     "An attempt" ++ _ = format_error(Error2),
 1783:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:log(halt, B),
 1784:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(halt),
 1785:     ok = disk_log:unblock(halt),
 1786:     ok = disk_log:block(halt, false),
 1787:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:log(halt, B),
 1788:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(halt),
 1789:     Parent = self(),
 1790:     Pid =
 1791:         spawn_link(fun() -> 
 1792:                            {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = 
 1793:                                disk_log:chunk(halt, start),
 1794:                            {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = 
 1795:                                disk_log:chunk_step(halt, start, 1),
 1796:                            Parent ! {self(), stopped}
 1797:                    end),
 1798:     receive {Pid,stopped} -> ok end,
 1799:     ok = disk_log:close(halt),
 1800:     del(File, No).
 1801: 
 1802: %% Run commands from the queue by unblocking.
 1803: block_queue(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1804: 
 1805:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1806:     Q = qlen(),
 1807:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1808:     No = 4,
 1809:     del(File, No), % cleanup
 1810:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1811: 
 1812:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 1813:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid, {open, File}),
 1814: 
 1815:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1816:     async_do(Pid, {blog, B}),
 1817:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1818:     ok = get_reply(),
 1819:     1 = no_written_items(n),
 1820:     Error1 = {error,{not_blocked,n}} = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1821:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1822: 
 1823:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1824:     async_do(Pid, {balog, "one string"}),
 1825:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1826:     ok = get_reply(),
 1827:     2 = no_written_items(n),
 1828: 
 1829:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1830:     async_do(Pid, sync),
 1831:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1832:     ok = get_reply(),
 1833: 
 1834:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1835:     async_do(Pid, truncate),
 1836:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1837:     ok = get_reply(),
 1838:     0 = no_items(n),
 1839: 
 1840:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1841:     async_do(Pid, {block, false}),
 1842:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1843:     ok = get_reply(),
 1844:     {error, {blocked_log, _}} = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1845:     ok = sync_do(Pid, unblock),
 1846: 
 1847:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1848:     async_do(Pid, {change_notify, Pid, true}),
 1849:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1850:     ok = get_reply(),
 1851:     [{_, true}] = owners(n),
 1852: 
 1853:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1854:     async_do(Pid, {change_notify, Pid, false}),
 1855:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1856:     ok = get_reply(),
 1857:     [{_, false}] = owners(n),
 1858: 
 1859:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1860:     async_do(Pid, {change_header, {head, header}}),
 1861:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1862:     {error, {badarg, head}} = get_reply(),
 1863: 
 1864:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1865:     async_do(Pid, {change_size, 17}),
 1866:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1867:     {error, {badarg, size}} = get_reply(),
 1868: 
 1869:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1870:     async_do(Pid, inc_wrap_file),
 1871:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1872:     ok = get_reply(),
 1873: 
 1874:     ok = sync_do(Pid, close),
 1875:     del(File, No),
 1876: 
 1877:     _Pid2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 1878:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid, {int_open, File}),
 1879: 
 1880:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1881:     async_do(Pid, {chunk, start}),
 1882:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1883:     eof = get_reply(),
 1884: 
 1885:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1886:     async_do(Pid, {chunk_step, start, 100}),
 1887:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1888:     {ok, _Cont} = get_reply(),
 1889: 
 1890:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1891:     async_do(Pid, {log,a_term}),
 1892:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1893:     ok = get_reply(),
 1894:     1 = no_written_items(n),
 1895: 
 1896:     ok = sync_do(Pid, close),
 1897:     sync_do(Pid, terminate),
 1898:     del(File, No),
 1899: 
 1900:     %% Test of the queue. Three processes involved here. Pid1's block
 1901:     %% request is queued. Pid2's log requests are put in the queue.
 1902:     %% When unblock is executed, Pid1's block request is granted.
 1903:     %% Pid2's log requests are executed when Pid1 unblocks.
 1904:     %% (This example should show that the pair 'queue' and 'messages' 
 1905:     %% in State does the trick - one does not need a "real" queue.)
 1906:     P0 = pps(),
 1907:     Name = n,
 1908:     Pid1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [Name]),
 1909:     {ok, Name} = sync_do(Pid1, {int_open, File, {1000,2}}),
 1910:     Pid2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [Name]),
 1911:     {ok, Name} = sync_do(Pid2, {int_open, File, {1000,2}}),
 1912:     ok = disk_log:block(Name),
 1913:     async_do(Pid1, {alog,{1,a}}),
 1914:     ok = get_reply(),
 1915:     async_do(Pid1, {alog,{2,b}}),
 1916:     ok = get_reply(),
 1917:     async_do(Pid1, {alog,{3,c}}),
 1918:     ok = get_reply(),
 1919:     async_do(Pid1, {alog,{4,d}}),
 1920:     ok = get_reply(),
 1921:     async_do(Pid1, block),
 1922:     async_do(Pid2, {alog,{5,e}}),
 1923:     ok = get_reply(),
 1924:     async_do(Pid2, {alog,{6,f}}),
 1925:     ok = get_reply(),
 1926:     ok = disk_log:unblock(Name),
 1927:     ok = get_reply(),
 1928:     async_do(Pid2, {alog,{7,g}}),
 1929:     ok = get_reply(),
 1930:     async_do(Pid2, {alog,{8,h}}),
 1931:     ok = get_reply(),
 1932:     async_do(Pid1, unblock),
 1933:     ok = get_reply(),
 1934:     ok = sync_do(Pid1, close),
 1935:     ok = sync_do(Pid2, close),
 1936:     sync_do(Pid1, terminate),
 1937:     sync_do(Pid2, terminate),
 1938:     Terms = get_all_terms(Name, File, wrap),
 1939:     true = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g},{8,h}] == Terms,
 1940:     del(File, 2),
 1941:     Q = qlen(),
 1942:     check_pps(P0),
 1943:     ok.
 1944: 
 1945: %% OTP-4880. Blocked processes did not get disk_log_stopped message.
 1946: block_queue2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1947:     Q = qlen(),
 1948:     P0 = pps(),
 1949:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1950:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1951:     No = 4,
 1952: 
 1953:     %% log requests are queued, and processed when the log is closed
 1954:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 1955:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid, {open, File}),
 1956:     ok = sync_do(Pid, block),
 1957:     %% Asynchronous stuff is ignored.
 1958:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [<<"foo">>,<<"bar">>]),
 1959:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [<<"more">>,<<"terms">>]),
 1960:     Fun =
 1961:         fun() ->
 1962:                 {error,no_such_log} = disk_log:sync(n),
 1963:                 receive {disk_log, _, {error, disk_log_stopped}} -> ok end
 1964:         end,
 1965:     SyncProc = spawn_link(Fun),
 1966:     timer:sleep(500),
 1967:     ok = sync_do(Pid, close),
 1968: 
 1969:     %% Make sure SyncProc has terminated to that we know that it has
 1970:     %% received the disk_log error message.
 1971:     SyncProcMonRef = erlang:monitor(process, SyncProc),
 1972:     receive {'DOWN',SyncProcMonRef,process,SyncProc,_} -> ok end,
 1973:     sync_do(Pid, terminate),
 1974:     {ok,<<>>} = file:read_file(File ++ ".1"),
 1975:     del(File, No),
 1976:     Q = qlen(),
 1977:     check_pps(P0),
 1978:     ok.
 1979: 
 1980: 
 1981: %% Test unblock/1.
 1982: unblock(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1983:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1984:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1985:     No = 1,
 1986:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1987: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 1988: 			     {format, external}]),
 1989:     ok = disk_log:block(n),
 1990:     spawn_link(?MODULE, try_unblock, [n]),
 1991:     timer:sleep(100),
 1992:     disk_log:close(n),
 1993:     del(File, No).
 1994: 
 1995: try_unblock(Log) ->
 1996:     Error = {error, {not_blocked_by_pid, n}} = disk_log:unblock(Log),
 1997:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error).
 1998:
