 2000: %% Test open/1 when old files exist.
 2001: open_overwrite(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2002: 
 2003:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2004:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2005:     No = 4,
 2006:     del(File, No), % cleanup
 2007: 
 2008:     %% read write
 2009:     First = "n.LOG.1",
 2010:     make_file(Dir, First, 8),
 2011: 
 2012:     Error1 = {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2013: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2014: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2015:     "The file" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2016:     del(File, No),
 2017: 
 2018:     make_file(Dir, First, 4),
 2019: 
 2020:     {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2021: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2022: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2023:     del(File, No),
 2024: 
 2025:     make_file(Dir, First, 0),
 2026: 
 2027:     {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2028: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, 
 2029: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2030:     %% read only
 2031:     make_file(Dir, First, 6),
 2032: 
 2033:     {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2034: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},{mode, read_only},
 2035: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2036:     del(File, No),
 2037: 
 2038:     make_file(Dir, First, 0),
 2039: 
 2040:     {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2041: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File},{type, wrap}, 
 2042: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2043: 		       {size, {100, No}}]),
 2044:     del(File, No),
 2045: 
 2046:     {error, _} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2047: 				{mode, read_only},
 2048: 				{format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2049: 
 2050:     file:delete(File),
 2051:     {ok,n} = disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File},
 2052: 			    {mode,read_write},{type,halt}]),
 2053:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2054:     ok = unwritable(File),
 2055:     {error, {file_error, File, _}} =
 2056: 	disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File},{mode,read_write},{type,halt}]),
 2057:     ok = writable(File),
 2058:     file:delete(File),
 2059: 
 2060:     {ok,n} = disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File},{format,external},
 2061: 			    {mode,read_write},{type,halt}]),
 2062:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2063:     ok = unwritable(File),
 2064:     {error, {file_error, File, _}} =
 2065:         disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File},{format,external},
 2066:                        {mode,read_write},{type,halt}]),
 2067:     ok = writable(File),
 2068:     file:delete(File),
 2069: 
 2070:     ok.
 2071: 
 2072: 
 2073: make_file(Dir, File, N) ->
 2074:     {ok, F} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, File), 
 2075:                         [raw, binary, read, write]),
 2076:     ok = file:truncate(F),
 2077:     case N of 
 2078: 	0 ->
 2079: 	    true;
 2080: 	_Else ->
 2081: 	    ok = file:write(F, [lists:seq(1,N)])
 2082:     end,
 2083:     ok = file:close(F).
 2084: 
 2085: %% Test open/1 option size.
 2086: open_size(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2087: 
 2088:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2089:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2090: 
 2091:     No = 4,
 2092:     file:delete(File),
 2093:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2094: 
 2095:     %% missing size option
 2096:     {error, {badarg, size}} =
 2097: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2098: 		       {format, internal}]),
 2099:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2100: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2101:     [n] = disk_log:all(),
 2102:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2103:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B, B, B]),
 2104:     ok = disk_log:sync(n),
 2105:     ok = disk_log:block(n),
 2106: 
 2107:     %% size option does not match existing size file, read_only
 2108:     Error1 = {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2109: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, 
 2110: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2111: 		       {size, {100, No + 1}}]),
 2112:     "The given size" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2113:     {ok, nn} =
 2114:         disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2115: 			      {mode, read_only},
 2116: 			      {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2117:     [_, _, _, _] = get_all_terms1(nn, start, []),
 2118:     disk_log:close(nn),
 2119: 
 2120:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 2121:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2122:     del(File, No),
 2123: 
 2124:     ok.
 2125: 
 2126: %% OTP-17062. When opening a disk log for the first time, the 'size'
 2127: %% option can change the size of the file.
 2128: open_change_size(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2129: 
 2130:     %% wrap logs
 2131: 
 2132:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2133:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2134: 
 2135:     No = 4,
 2136:     file:delete(File),
 2137:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2138: 
 2139:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2140: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2141:     [n] = disk_log:all(),
 2142:     1 = curf(n),
 2143:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2144:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B, B, B]),
 2145:     4 = curf(n),
 2146:     disk_log:close(n),
 2147: 
 2148:     %% size option does not match existing size file, read_only
 2149:     Error1 = {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2150: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2151: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2152: 		       {size, {100, No + 1}}]),
 2153:     "The given size" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2154:     {ok, nn} =
 2155:         disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2156: 			      {mode, read_only},
 2157: 			      {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2158:     [_, _, _, _] = get_all_terms(nn),
 2159:     {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2160: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2161: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2162: 		       {size, {100, No + 1}}]),
 2163:     {error,{badarg,repair_read_only}} =
 2164: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2165: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2166: 		       {repair, truncate}, {size, {100, No + 1}}]),
 2167:     disk_log:close(nn),
 2168: 
 2169:     %% size option does not match existing size file, read_write
 2170:     No1 = No + 1,
 2171:     No2 = No + 2,
 2172:     %% open/1 can change the size of a newly opened wrap log
 2173:     {ok, nn} =
 2174: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2175: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No1}}]),
 2176:     {100, No1} = info(nn, size, foo),
 2177:     4 = curf(nn),
 2178:     %% open/1 cannot change the size of an open wrap log
 2179:     {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2180: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2181: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No2}}]),
 2182:     ok = disk_log:close(nn),
 2183: 
 2184:     %% open/1 cannot change the size of a newly opened wrap log to 'infinity'
 2185:     {ok, nn} =
 2186: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2187: 		       {format, internal}, {size, infinity}]),
 2188:     {100, 5} = info(nn, size, foo),
 2189:     4 = curf(nn),
 2190:     %% open/1 cannot change the size of an open wrap log
 2191:     {error, {size_mismatch, {100,5}, infinity}} =
 2192: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2193: 		       {format, internal}, {size, infinity}]),
 2194:     ok = disk_log:close(nn),
 2195: 
 2196:     %% size option does not match existing size file, truncating
 2197:     {ok, nn} =
 2198: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2199: 		       {repair, truncate}, {format, internal},
 2200: 		       {size, {100, No2}}]),
 2201:     {100, No2} = info(nn, size, foo),
 2202:     1 = curf(nn),
 2203:     [] = get_all_terms(nn),
 2204:     %% open/1 cannot change the size of an open wrap log
 2205:     {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2206: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2207: 		       {repair, truncate}, {format, internal},
 2208: 		       {size, {100, No2 + 1}}]),
 2209:     ok = disk_log:close(nn),
 2210: 
 2211:     del(File, No),
 2212: 
 2213:     %% halt logs
 2214:     Name = 'log.LOG',
 2215:     HFile = "log.LOG",
 2216:     Finite = 10000,
 2217:     {ok, _} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 2218: 			     {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2219:     ok = disk_log:blog(Name, B),
 2220: 
 2221:     %% open/1 ignores the given size if the halt log is open,
 2222:     %% which is backwards compatible.
 2223:     {ok, Name} =
 2224:         disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,Finite},
 2225:                        {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2226:     infinity = info(Name, size, foo),
 2227:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
 2228:     %% open/1 can change the size of a newly opened halt log
 2229:     {ok, Name} =
 2230:         disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,Finite},
 2231:                        {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2232:     Finite = info(Name, size, foo),
 2233:     %% open/1 ignores the given size if the halt log is open,
 2234:     %% which is backwards compatible.
 2235:     {ok, Name} =
 2236:         disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 2237:                        {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2238:     Finite = info(Name, size, foo),
 2239:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
 2240: 
 2241:     %% open/1 can open a halt log even if the given size is too small,
 2242:     %% which is backwards compatible.
 2243:     {ok, Name} =
 2244:         disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,10},
 2245:                        {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2246:     file:delete(HFile),
 2247:     ok.
 2248: 
 2249: %% Test open/1 with {repair, truncate}.
 2250: open_truncate(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2251:

 2254:     No = 4,
 2255:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2256: 
 2257:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2258: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2259:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2260:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B, B, B]),
 2261:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2262:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2263: 			     {repair,truncate},
 2264: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2265:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2266:     [] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 2267:     del(File, No),
 2268:     ok.

 2271: %% Try some invalid open/1 options.
 2272: open_error(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2273:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2274: 
 2275:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2276:     No = 4,
 2277:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2278: 
 2279:     {error, {badarg, name}} = disk_log:open([{file, File}]),
 2280:     {error, {badarg, file}} = disk_log:open([{name,{foo,bar}}]),
 2281:     {error, {badarg, [{foo,bar}]}} = disk_log:open([{foo,bar}]),
 2282: 
 2283:     %% external logs, read_only.
 2284:     {error, {file_error, _, enoent}} =
 2285: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2286: 		       {size, {100,No}},
 2287: 		       {format, external}, {mode, read_only}]),
 2288:     Error5 = {error, {file_error, _, enoent}} =
 2289: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2290: 		       {size, 100},
 2291: 		       {format, external}, {mode, read_only}]),
 2292:     true = lists:prefix("\"" ++ File, format_error(Error5)),
 2293: 
 2294:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2295: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2296:     %% Already owner, ignored.
 2297:     {ok, n} =
 2298: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2299: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2300:     Error2 = {error, {name_already_open, n}} =
 2301: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, another_file}, {type, wrap},
 2302: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2303:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error2),
 2304:     Error1 = {error, {arg_mismatch, notify, false, true}} =
 2305: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2306: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}, {notify, true}]),
 2307:     "The value" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2308:     Error3 = {error, {open_read_write, n}} =
 2309: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, 
 2310: 		       {mode, read_only},
 2311: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2312:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error3),
 2313:     {error, {badarg, size}} =
 2314:         disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2315:                        {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2316:     {error, {arg_mismatch, type, wrap, halt}} =
 2317: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2318: 		       {format, external}]),
 2319:     {error, {arg_mismatch, format, external, internal}} =
 2320: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2321: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2322:     {error, {arg_mismatch, repair, true, false}} =
 2323: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2324: 		       {format, external}, {repair, false}]),
 2325:     {error, {size_mismatch, {100,4}, {1000,4}}} =
 2326: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2327: 		       {format, external}, {size, {1000, No}}]),
 2328:     {error, {arg_mismatch, head, none, _}} =
 2329: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2330: 		       {head, "header"},
 2331: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2332:     {error, {badarg, size}} =
 2333: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2334: 		       {format, external}, {size, 100}]),
 2335: 
 2336:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2337: 
 2338:     {ok, n} =
 2339: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2340: 		       {mode, read_only},
 2341: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2342:     Error4 = {error, {open_read_only, n}} =
 2343: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2344: 		       {mode, read_write},
 2345: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2346:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error4),
 2347:     ok = disk_log:close(n),

 2351: 
 2352: %% Do something quickly after close/1.
 2353: close_race(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2354:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2355:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2356:     No = 1,
 2357:     del(File, No),  % cleanup
 2358:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2359: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 2360: 			     {format, internal}]),
 2361:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2362:     Error1 = {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:close(n),
 2363:     "There is no disk" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2364: 
 2365:     %% Pid1 blocks, Pid2 closes without being suspended.
 2366:     Pid1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2367:     Pid2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2368:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid1, {open, File}),
 2369:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid2, {open, File}),
 2370:     ok = sync_do(Pid1, block),
 2371:     [{_, false}, {_, false}] = sync_do(Pid1, owners),
 2372:     ok = sync_do(Pid2, close),
 2373:     [{_, false}] = sync_do(Pid1, owners),
 2374:     ok = sync_do(Pid1, close),
 2375:     sync_do(Pid1, terminate),
 2376:     sync_do(Pid2, terminate),
 2377:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2378: 
 2379:     %% Pid3 blocks, Pid3 closes. Pid4 should still be ablo to use log.
 2380:     Pid3 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2381:     Pid4 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2382:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid3, {open, File}),
 2383:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid4, {open, File}),
 2384:     ok = sync_do(Pid3, block),
 2385:     ok = sync_do(Pid3, close),
 2386:     [{_Pid4, false}] = sync_do(Pid4, owners),
 2387:     sync_do(Pid3, terminate),
 2388:     sync_do(Pid4, terminate),
 2389:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2390: 
 2391:     %% Pid5 blocks, Pid5 terminates. Pid6 should still be ablo to use log.
 2392:     Pid5 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2393:     Pid6 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2394:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid5, {open, File}),
 2395:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid6, {open, File}),
 2396:     ok = sync_do(Pid5, block),
 2397:     sync_do(Pid5, terminate),
 2398:     [{_Pid6, false}] = sync_do(Pid6, owners),
 2399:     sync_do(Pid6, terminate),
 2400:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2401:     del(File, No),  % cleanup
 2402:     ok.
 2403: 
 2404: %% Block, unblock, close, terminate.
 2405: close_block(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2406: 
 2407:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2408:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2409:     No = 1,
 2410:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2411: 
 2412:     P0 = pps(),
 2413:     %% One of two owners terminates.
 2414:     Pid1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2415:     Pid2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2416:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid1, {open, File}),
 2417:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid2, {open, File}),
 2418:     [_, _] = sync_do(Pid1, owners),
 2419:     [_, _] = sync_do(Pid2, owners),
 2420:     0 = sync_do(Pid1, users),
 2421:     0 = sync_do(Pid2, users),
 2422:     sync_do(Pid1, terminate),
 2423:     [_] = sync_do(Pid2, owners),
 2424:     0 = sync_do(Pid2, users),
 2425:     sync_do(Pid2, terminate),
 2426:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2427:     check_pps(P0),
 2428: 
 2429:     %% Users terminate (no link...).
 2430:     Pid3 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2431:     Pid4 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2432:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid3, {open, File, none}),
 2433:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid4, {open, File, none}),
 2434:     [] = sync_do(Pid3, owners),
 2435:     [] = sync_do(Pid4, owners),
 2436:     2 = sync_do(Pid3, users),
 2437:     2 = sync_do(Pid4, users),
 2438:     sync_do(Pid3, terminate),
 2439:     [] = sync_do(Pid4, owners),
 2440:     2 = sync_do(Pid4, users),
 2441:     sync_do(Pid4, terminate),
 2442:     disk_log:close(n),
 2443:     disk_log:close(n),
 2444:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2445:     check_pps(P0),
 2446: 
 2447:     %% Blocking owner terminates.
 2448:     Pid5 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2449:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2450: 			     {linkto, none},{size, {100,No}},
 2451: 			     {format, external}]),
 2452:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid5, {open, File}),
 2453:     ok = sync_do(Pid5, block),
 2454:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2455:     [_] = owners(n),
 2456:     sync_do(Pid5, terminate),
 2457:     ok = status(n),
 2458:     [] = owners(n),
 2459:     1 = users(n),
 2460:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2461:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2462:     check_pps(P0),
 2463: 
 2464:     %% Blocking user terminates.
 2465:     Pid6 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2466:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2467: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2468:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid6, {open, File, none}),
 2469:     ok = sync_do(Pid6, block),
 2470:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2471:     [_] = owners(n),
 2472:     1 = users(n),
 2473:     sync_do(Pid6, terminate), % very silently...
 2474:     ok = status(n),
 2475:     [_] = owners(n),
 2476:     1 = users(n),
 2477:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2478:     [] = owners(n),
 2479:     1 = users(n),
 2480:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2481:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2482:     check_pps(P0),
 2483: 
 2484:     %% Blocking owner terminates.
 2485:     Pid7 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2486:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2487: 			     {linkto, none},
 2488: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2489:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid7, {open, File}),
 2490:     ok = sync_do(Pid7, block),
 2491:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2492:     [_] = owners(n),
 2493:     1 = users(n),
 2494:     sync_do(Pid7, terminate),
 2495:     ok = status(n),
 2496:     [] = owners(n),
 2497:     1 = users(n),
 2498:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2499:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2500:     check_pps(P0),
 2501: 
 2502:     %% Two owners, the blocking one terminates.
 2503:     Pid8 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2504:     Pid9 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2505:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid8, {open, File}),
 2506:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid9, {open, File}),
 2507:     ok = sync_do(Pid8, block),
 2508:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2509:     sync_do(Pid8, terminate),
 2510:     ok = status(n),
 2511:     [_] = sync_do(Pid9, owners),
 2512:     0 = sync_do(Pid9, users),
 2513:     sync_do(Pid9, terminate),
 2514:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2515:     check_pps(P0),
 2516: 
 2517:     %% Blocking user closes.
 2518:     Pid10 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2519:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2520: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2521:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid10, {open, File, none}),
 2522:     ok = sync_do(Pid10, block),
 2523:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2524:     [_] = owners(n),
 2525:     1 = users(n),
 2526:     ok = sync_do(Pid10, close),
 2527:     ok = status(n),
 2528:     [_] = owners(n),
 2529:     0 = users(n),
 2530:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2531:     sync_do(Pid10, terminate),
 2532:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2533:     check_pps(P0),
 2534: 
 2535:     %% Blocking user unblocks and closes.
 2536:     Pid11 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2537:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2538: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2539:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid11, {open, File, none}),
 2540:     ok = sync_do(Pid11, block),
 2541:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2542:     [_] = owners(n),
 2543:     1 = users(n),
 2544:     ok = sync_do(Pid11, unblock),
 2545:     ok = sync_do(Pid11, close),
 2546:     ok = status(n),
 2547:     [_] = owners(n),
 2548:     0 = users(n),
 2549:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2550:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2551:     sync_do(Pid11, terminate),
 2552:     check_pps(P0),
 2553: 
 2554:     %% Blocking owner closes.
 2555:     Pid12 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2556:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2557: 			     {linkto, none},
 2558: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2559:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid12, {open, File}),
 2560:     ok = sync_do(Pid12, block),
 2561:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2562:     [_] = owners(n),
 2563:     1 = users(n),
 2564:     ok = sync_do(Pid12, close),
 2565:     ok = status(n),
 2566:     [] = owners(n),
 2567:     1 = users(n),
 2568:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2569:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2570:     sync_do(Pid12, terminate),
 2571:     check_pps(P0),
 2572: 
 2573:     %% Blocking owner unblocks and closes.
 2574:     Pid13 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2575:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2576: 			     {linkto, none},
 2577: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2578:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid13, {open, File}),
 2579:     ok = sync_do(Pid13, block),
 2580:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2581:     [_] = owners(n),
 2582:     1 = users(n),
 2583:     ok = sync_do(Pid13, unblock),
 2584:     ok = sync_do(Pid13, close),
 2585:     ok = status(n),
 2586:     [] = owners(n),
 2587:     1 = users(n),
 2588:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2589:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2590:     sync_do(Pid13, terminate),
 2591:     check_pps(P0),
 2592: 
 2593:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2594:     ok.
 2595: 
 2596: %% OTP-4745. Deadlock with just an ordinary log could happen.
 2597: close_deadlock(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2598:     true = is_alive(),
 2599: 
 2600:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2601: 
 2602:     F1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "a.LOG"),
 2603:     file:delete(F1),
 2604:     Self = self(),
 2605: 
 2606:     %% One process opens the log at the same time as another process
 2607:     %% closes the log. Used to always cause deadlock before OTP-4745.
 2608:     Name = a,
 2609:     Fun = fun() -> open_close(Self, Name, F1) end,
 2610:     P = spawn(Fun),
 2611:     receive {P, Name} -> ok end,
 2612:     {ok, L} = disk_log:open([{name,Name},{file,F1}]),
 2613:     ok = disk_log:close(L),
 2614:     receive {P, done} -> ok end,
 2615:     file:delete(F1),
 2616: 
 2617:     %% One process opens the log at the same time as another process
 2618:     %% closes the log due to file error while truncating.
 2619:     %% This test is time dependent, but does not fail when it does not
 2620:     %% "work". When it works, as it seems to do right now :), the
 2621:     %% disk_log_server gets {error, no_such_log}, receives the EXIT
 2622:     %% message caused by truncate, and tries to open the log again.
 2623:     No = 4,
 2624:     LDir = F1 ++ ".2",
 2625:     file:del_dir(LDir),
 2626:     del(F1, No),
 2627:     ok = file:make_dir(LDir),
 2628:     Fun2 = fun() -> open_truncate(Self, Name, F1, No) end,
 2629:     P2 = spawn(Fun2),
 2630:     receive {P2, Name} -> ok end,
 2631:     {ok, L} = disk_log:open([{name, Name}, {file, F1}, {type, wrap},
 2632: 			     {format, external}]),
 2633:     %% Note: truncate causes the disk log process to terminate. One
 2634:     %% cannot say if open above happened before, after, or during the
 2635:     %% termination. The link to the owner is removed before termination.
 2636:     case disk_log:close(L) of
 2637: 	ok -> ok;
 2638: 	{error,no_such_log} ->
 2639: 	    ok
 2640:     end,
 2641:     receive {P2, done} -> ok end,
 2642:     del(F1, No),
 2643:     file:del_dir(LDir),
 2644:     ok.
 2645: 
 2646: open_close(Pid, Name, File) ->
 2647:     {ok, L} = disk_log:open([{name,Name},{file,File}]),
 2648:     Pid ! {self(), Name},
 2649:     ok = disk_log:close(L),
 2650:     Pid ! {self(), done}.
 2651: 
 2652: open_truncate(Pid, Name, File, No) ->
 2653:     {ok, L} = disk_log:open([{name, Name}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2654:                              {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2655:     Pid ! {self(), Name},
 2656:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:truncate(L),
 2657:     %% The file has been closed, the disklog process has terminated.
 2658:     Pid ! {self(), done}.
 2659: 
 2660: async_do(Pid, Req) ->
 2661:     Pid ! {self(), Req},
 2662:     %% make sure the request is queued
 2663:     timer:sleep(100).
 2664: 
 2665: get_reply() ->
 2666:     receive Reply -> 
 2667: 	    Reply 
 2668:     end.
 2669: 
 2670: sync_do(Pid, Req) ->
 2671:     Pid ! {self(), Req},
 2672:     receive
 2673:         Reply when Req =:= terminate ->
 2674:             timer:sleep(500),
 2675:             Reply;
 2676: 	Reply ->
 2677: 	    Reply
 2678:     end.
 2679: 
 2680: lserv(Log) ->
 2681:     receive
 2682: 	{From, {open, File}} ->
 2683: 	    From ! disk_log:open([{name, Log}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2684: 				  {size, {100,1}}, {format, external}]);
 2685: 	{From, {open, File, LinkTo}} ->
 2686: 	    From ! disk_log:open([{name, Log}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2687: 				  {linkto, LinkTo}, {size, {100,1}}, 
 2688: 				  {format, external}]);
 2689: 	{From, {int_open, File}} ->
 2690: 	    From ! disk_log:open([{name, Log}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2691: 				  {size, {100,1}}]);
 2692: 	{From, {int_open, File, Size}} ->
 2693: 	    From ! disk_log:open([{name, Log}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2694: 				  {size, Size}]);
 2695: 	{From, block} ->
 2696: 	    From ! disk_log:block(Log);
 2697: 	{From, {block, Bool}} ->
 2698: 	    From ! disk_log:block(Log, Bool);
 2699: 	{From, unblock} ->
 2700: 	    From ! disk_log:unblock(Log);
 2701: 	{From, close} ->
 2702: 	    From ! disk_log:close(Log);
 2703: 	{From, owners} ->
 2704: 	    From ! owners(Log);
 2705: 	{From, users} ->
 2706: 	    From ! users(Log);
 2707: 	{From, sync} ->
 2708: 	    From ! disk_log:sync(Log);
 2709: 	{From, truncate} ->
 2710: 	    From ! disk_log:truncate(Log);
 2711: 	{From, terminate} ->
 2712: 	    From ! terminated,
 2713: 	    exit(normal);
 2714: 	{From, {log, B}} ->
 2715: 	    From ! disk_log:log(Log, B);
 2716: 	{From, {blog, B}} ->
 2717: 	    From ! disk_log:blog(Log, B);
 2718: 	{From, {alog, B}} ->
 2719: 	    From ! disk_log:alog(Log, B);
 2720: 	{From, {balog, B}} ->
 2721: 	    From ! disk_log:balog(Log, B);
 2722: 	{From, {change_notify, Pid, Bool}} ->
 2723: 	    From ! disk_log:change_notify(Log, Pid, Bool);
 2724: 	{From, {change_header, Header}} ->
 2725: 	    From ! disk_log:change_header(Log, Header);
 2726: 	{From, {change_size, Size}} ->
 2727: 	    From ! disk_log:change_size(Log, Size);
 2728: 	{From, inc_wrap_file} ->
 2729: 	    From ! disk_log:inc_wrap_file(Log);
 2730: 	{From, {chunk, Cont}} ->
 2731: 	    From ! disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont);
 2732: 	{From, {chunk_step, Cont, N}} ->
 2733: 	    From ! disk_log:chunk_step(Log, Cont, N);
 2734: 	Any ->
 2735: 	    io:format("invalid request ~p~n", [Any]),
 2736: 	    exit(abnormal)
 2737:     end,
 2738:     lserv(Log).
 2739: 
 2740: 
 2741: %% Error while repairing.
 2742: error_repair(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2743:     %% not all error situations are covered by this test
 2744: 
 2745:     DataDir = ?datadir(Conf),
 2746:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2747: 
 2748:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "n.LOG"),
 2749:     No = 4,
 2750:     file:delete(File),
 2751:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2752: 
 2753:     %% kurt.LOG is not closed and has four logged items, one is recovered
 2754:     copy_wrap_log("kurt.LOG", "n.LOG", No, DataDir, PrivDir),
 2755:     {repaired,n,{recovered,1},{badbytes,0}} =
 2756: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size,{40,No}}]),
 2757:     1 = cur_cnt(n),
 2758:     53 = curb(n),
 2759:     4 = no_items(n),
 2760:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2761: 
 2762:     %% temporary repair file cannot be created
 2763:     copy_wrap_log("kurt.LOG", "n.LOG", No, DataDir, PrivDir),
 2764:     Dir = File ++ ".4" ++ ".TMP",
 2765:     ok = file:make_dir(Dir),
 2766:     P0 = pps(),
 2767:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} =
 2768: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size,{40,4}}]),
 2769:     check_pps(P0),
 2770:     del(File, No),
 2771:     ok = file:del_dir(Dir),
 2772: 
 2773:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE, self()),
 2774:     %% repair a file
 2775:     P1 = pps(),
 2776:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2777: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {38,No}}]),
 2778:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [{this,is}]), % first file full
 2779:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [{some,terms}]), % second file full
 2780:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2781:     BadFile = add_ext(File, 2), % current file
 2782:     set_opened(BadFile),
 2783:     crash(BadFile, 26), % the binary is now invalid
 2784:     {repaired,n,{recovered,0},{badbytes,24}} =
 2785: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2786: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {38,No}}]),
 2787:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2788:     check_pps(P1),
 2789:     del(File, No),
 2790:     receive {info_msg, _, "disk_log: repairing" ++ _, _} -> ok
 2791:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(failed) end,
 2792: 
 2793:     %% yet another repair
 2794:     P2 = pps(),
 2795:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2796: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {4000,No}}]),
 2797:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [{this,is},{some,terms}]),
 2798:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2799:     BadFile2 = add_ext(File, 1), % current file
 2800:     set_opened(BadFile2),
 2801:     crash(BadFile2, 47), % the second binary is now invalid
 2802:     {repaired,n,{recovered,1},{badbytes,24}} =
 2803: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2804: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {4000,No}}]),
 2805:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2806:     check_pps(P2),
 2807:     del(File, No),
 2808:     receive {info_msg, _, "disk_log: repairing" ++ _, _} -> ok
 2809:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(failed) end,
 2810: 
 2811:     %% Repair, large term
 2812:     Big = term_to_binary(lists:duplicate(66000,$a)),
 2813:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2814: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {40,No}}]),
 2815:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [Big]),
 2816:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2817:     set_opened(add_ext(File, 1)),
 2818:     {repaired,n,{recovered,1},{badbytes,0}} =
 2819: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2820: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {40,No}}]),
 2821:     {_, [Got]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 2822:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2823:     Got = Big,
 2824:     del(File, No),
 2825:     receive {info_msg, _, "disk_log: repairing" ++ _, _} -> ok
 2826:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(failed) end,
 2827: 
 2828:     %% A term a little smaller than a chunk, then big terms.
 2829:     BigSmall = mk_bytes(1024*64-8-12),
 2830:     file:delete(File),
 2831:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2832: 			     {format, internal}]),
 2833:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [BigSmall, Big, Big]),
 2834:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2835:     set_opened(File),
 2836:     FileSize = file_size(File),
 2837:     crash(File, FileSize-byte_size(Big)-4),
 2838:     Error1 = {error, {need_repair, _}} =
 2839:         disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {repair, false},
 2840:                        {type, halt}, {format, internal}]),
 2841:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2842:     {repaired,n,{recovered,2},{badbytes,132013}} =
 2843:         disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {repair, true},
 2844:                        {type, halt}, {format, internal}]),
 2845:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2846:     file:delete(File),
 2847:     receive {info_msg, _, "disk_log: repairing" ++ _, _} -> ok
 2848:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(failed) end,
 2849: 
 2850:     %% The header is recovered.
 2851:     {ok,n} =
 2852: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2853: 		       {format, internal},
 2854: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head"}]}}]),
 2855:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [list,'of',terms]),
 2856:     ["head",list,'of',terms] = get_all_terms(n),
 2857:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2858:     set_opened(File),
 2859:     crash(File, 30),
 2860:     {repaired,n,{recovered,3},{badbytes,15}} =
 2861:         disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2862: 		       {format, internal},{repair,true}, {quiet, true},
 2863: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head"}]}}]),
 2864:     ["head",'of',terms] = get_all_terms(n),
 2865:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2866:     error_logger:delete_report_handler(?MODULE),
 2867:     file:delete(File),
 2868:     {messages, []} = process_info(self(), messages),
 2869: 
 2870:     ok.
 2871: 
 2872: set_opened(File) ->
 2873:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [raw, binary, read, write]),
 2874:     ok = file:write(Fd, [?LOGMAGIC, ?OPENED]),
 2875:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 2876: 
 2877: %% Error while repairing.
 2878: error_log(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2879:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2880: 
 2881:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2882:     No = 4,
 2883:     file:delete(File),
 2884:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2885:     LDir = File ++ ".2",
 2886: 
 2887:     Q = qlen(),
 2888:     %% dummy just to get all processes "above" disk_log going
 2889:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2890: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2891:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2892:     del(File, No),
 2893: 
 2894:     %% inc_wrap_file fails, the external log is not terminated
 2895:     P0 = pps(),
 2896:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2897: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2898:     ok = file:make_dir(LDir),
 2899:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(n),
 2900:     timer:sleep(500),
 2901:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2902:     del(File, No),
 2903: 
 2904:     %% inc_wrap_file fails, the internal log is not terminated, ./File.2/ exists
 2905:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2906: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2907:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(n),
 2908:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2909:     del(File, No),
 2910: 
 2911:     %% truncate fails, the log is terminated, ./File.2/ exists
 2912:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2913: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2914:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:truncate(n),
 2915:     check_pps(P0),
 2916:     del(File, No),
 2917: 
 2918:     %% OTP-4880.
 2919:     %% reopen (rename) fails, the log is terminated, ./File.2/ exists
 2920:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2921: 			     {format, external},{size, 100000}]),
 2922:     {error, {file_error, _, eisdir}} = disk_log:reopen(n, LDir),
 2923:     check_pps(P0),
 2924:     file:delete(File),
 2925: 
 2926:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2927: 
 2928:     %% OTP-4880. reopen a wrap log, rename fails
 2929:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG2"),
 2930:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File2}, {type, wrap},
 2931: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2932:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 2933:     {error, {file_error, _, eisdir}} = disk_log:reopen(n, File),
 2934:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:close(n),
 2935:     del(File2, No),
 2936:     del(File, No),
 2937: 
 2938:     %% log, external wrap log, ./File.2/ exists
 2939:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2940: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2941:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 2942:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2943:     del(File, No),
 2944: 
 2945:     %% log, internal wrap log, ./File.2/ exists
 2946:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2947: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2948:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 2949:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2950:     del(File, No),
 2951: 
 2952:     ok = file:del_dir(LDir),
 2953: 
 2954:     %% can't remove file when changing size
 2955:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2956: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2957:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B,B]),
 2958:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, No-2}),
 2959:     Three = File ++ ".3",
 2960:     ok = file:delete(Three),
 2961:     ok = file:make_dir(Three),
 2962:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 2963:     timer:sleep(500),
 2964:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2965:     ok = file:del_dir(Three),
 2966:     del(File, No),
 2967:     Q = qlen(),
 2968:     ok.
 2969: 
 2970: %% Test chunk and chunk_step.
 2971: chunk(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2972:     %% See also halt_ro_crash/1 above.
 2973: 
 2974:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2975:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2976:     No = 4,
 2977:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2978:     BB = mk_bytes(64000), % 64 kB chunks
 2979:     del(File, No),% cleanup
 2980: 
 2981:     %% Make sure chunk_step skips the rest of the binary.
 2982:     %% OTP-3716. This was a bug...
 2983:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2984: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {50,No}}]),
 2985:     %% 1, 2 and 3 on file one, 4 on file two.
 2986:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [1,2,3,4]),
 2987:     {I1, [1]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start, 1),
 2988:     [{node,Node}] = disk_log:chunk_info(I1),
 2989:     Node = node(),
 2990:     Error1 = {error, {no_continuation, foobar}} =
 2991:         disk_log:chunk_info(foobar),
 2992:     "The term" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2993:     {ok, I2} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, I1, 1),
 2994:     {error, {badarg, continuation}} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, foobar, 1),
 2995:     {I3, [4]} = disk_log:chunk(n, I2, 1),
 2996:     {ok, I4} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, I3, -1),
 2997:     {_, [1]} = disk_log:chunk(n, I4, 1),
 2998:     {error, {badarg, continuation}} = disk_log:bchunk(n, 'begin'),
 2999:     {Ib1, [Bin1,Bin2]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, start, 2),
 3000:     1 = binary_to_term(Bin1),
 3001:     2 = binary_to_term(Bin2),
 3002:     {ok, Ib2} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, Ib1, 1),
 3003:     {Ib3, [Bin3]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, Ib2, 1),
 3004:     4 = binary_to_term(Bin3),
 3005:     {ok, Ib4} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, Ib3, -1),
 3006:     {_, [Bin4]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, Ib4, 1),
 3007:     1 = binary_to_term(Bin4),
 3008:     {Ib5, [Bin1, Bin2, Bin17]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, start),
 3009:     3 = binary_to_term(Bin17),
 3010:     {Ib6, [Bin3]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, Ib5, infinity),
 3011:     eof = disk_log:bchunk(n, Ib6, infinity),
 3012:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3013:     del(File, No), % cleanup
 3014: 
 3015:     %% external log, cannot read chunks
 3016:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3017: 			     {format, external}, {size, {100,No}}]),
 3018:     {error, {badarg, continuation}} = disk_log:chunk(n, 'begin'),
 3019:     {error, {format_external, n}} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),

 3021:         disk_log:chunk_step(n, start, 1),

 3023:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3024:     del(File, No),
 3025:

 3028: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {100,No}}]),
 3029:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B,B]),
 3030:     {C1, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 3031:     {C2, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C1),
 3032:     {C3, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C2),
 3033:     {C4, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C3, 1),
 3034:     eof = disk_log:chunk(n, C4),
 3035:     {C5, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 3036:     {ok, C6} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, C5, 1),
 3037:     {C7, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C6),
 3038:     {ok, C8} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, C7, 1),
 3039:     {_, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C8),
 3040:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3041: 
 3042:     %% wrap, read_only
 3043:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3044: 			     {mode, read_only},
 3045: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {100,No}}]),
 3046:     {CC1, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 3047:     {CC2, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC1),
 3048:     {CC3, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC2),
 3049:     {CC4, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC3, 1),
 3050:     eof = disk_log:chunk(n, CC4),
 3051:     {CC5, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 3052:     {ok, CC6} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, CC5, 1),
 3053:     {CC7, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC6),
 3054:     {ok, CC8} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, CC7, 1),
 3055:     {_, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC8),
 3056:     ok = disk_log:close(n),

 3058:     %% OTP-3716. A bug: {Error, List} and {Error, List, Bad} could be
 3059:     %% returned from chunk/2.

 3221: 			     {format, internal}, {mode, read_only}]),

 3232:     NotMD5term = mk_bytes((64*1024-8)-1),

 3245: 			     {format, internal}]),

 3247:     ok = disk_log:close(n),

 3251:     DataDir = ?datadir(Conf),
 3252:     OldTermsFileOrig = filename:join(DataDir, "old_terms.LOG"),
 3253:     OldTermsFile = filename:join(Dir, "old_terms.LOG"),
 3254:     copy_file(OldTermsFileOrig, OldTermsFile),
 3255:     {[_,_,_,_],0} = get_all_terms_and_bad(n, OldTermsFile, halt),
 3256:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, OldTermsFile},
 3257: 			     {type, halt}, {format, internal}]),
 3258:     [_,_,_,_] = get_all_terms(n),

 3260:     file:delete(OldTermsFile),
 3261: 
 3262:     ok.

 3264: %% OTP-5558. Keep the contents of index files after disk crash.
 3265: error_index(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3266:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3267: 
 3268:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 3269:     IdxFile = File ++ ".idx",
 3270:     No = 4,
 3271:     file:delete(File),
 3272:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 3273: 
 3274:     Args = [{name,n},{type,wrap},{size,{100,No}},{file,File}],
 3275:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open(Args),
 3276:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3277:     Q = qlen(),
 3278:     P0 = pps(),
 3279:     ok = file:write_file(IdxFile, <<"abc">>),
 3280:     {error, {invalid_index_file, _}} = disk_log:open(Args),
 3281:     {error, {invalid_index_file, _}} = disk_log:open(Args),
 3282:     {error, {invalid_index_file, _}} = disk_log:open(Args),
 3283: 
 3284:     del(File, No),
 3285:     check_pps(P0),
 3286:     true = (Q == qlen()),
 3287:     ok.
 3288: 
 3289: %% Test truncate/1 on halt and wrap logs.
 3290: truncate(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3291:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3292: 
 3293:     Q = qlen(),
 3294:     Halt = join(Dir, "halt.LOG"),
 3295:     %% Halt logs.
 3296: 
 3297:     file:delete(Halt), % cleanup
 3298:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt}, {file, Halt},
 3299: 				{head, header}, {notify, true}]),
 3300:     infinity = sz(halt),
 3301:     ok = disk_log:truncate(halt, tjohej),
 3302:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), halt, {truncated, 1}}),
 3303:     ok = disk_log:change_size(halt, 10000),
 3304:     10000 = sz(halt),
 3305:     disk_log:close(halt),
 3306:     [tjohej] = get_all_terms(halt, Halt, halt),
 3307:     file:delete(Halt),
 3308: 
 3309:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt}, {file, Halt},
 3310: 				{head, header}, {notify, true}]),
 3311:     ok = disk_log:truncate(halt),
 3312:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), halt, {truncated, 1}}),
 3313:     disk_log:close(halt),
 3314:     [header] = get_all_terms(halt, Halt, halt),
 3315:     file:delete(Halt),
 3316: 
 3317:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt},
 3318: 				{file, Halt}, {format, external},
 3319: 				{head, "header"}, {notify, false}]),
 3320:     ok = disk_log:btruncate(halt, "apa"),
 3321:     disk_log:close(halt),
 3322:     3 = file_size(Halt),
 3323:     file:delete(Halt),
 3324: 
 3325:     %% Wrap logs.
 3326:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 3327:     No = 4,
 3328:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 3329:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 3330: 
 3331:     %% Internal with header.
 3332:     Size = {100, No},
 3333:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3334: 			     {head, header}, {notify, true},
 3335: 			     {size, Size}]),
 3336:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 3337:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 3338:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3339:     ok = disk_log:truncate(n, apa),
 3340:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 6}}),
 3341:     {0, 0} = no_overflows(n),
 3342:     22 = curb(n),
 3343:     1 = curf(n),
 3344:     1 = cur_cnt(n),
 3345:     true = (Size == sz(n)),
 3346: 
 3347:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B]),
 3348:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3349:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3350:     [apa, _, header, _] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 3351:     del(File, No),
 3352: 
 3353:     %% Internal without general header.
 3354:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3355: 			     {notify, true},
 3356: 			     {size, {100, No}}]),
 3357:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 3358:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3359:     ok = disk_log:truncate(n, apa),
 3360:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 3}}),
 3361:     {0, 0} = no_overflows(n),
 3362:     22 = curb(n),
 3363:     1 = curf(n),
 3364:     1 = cur_cnt(n),
 3365:     true = (Size == sz(n)),
 3366: 
 3367:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B]),
 3368:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3369:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3370:     [apa, _, _] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 3371:     del(File, No),
 3372: 
 3373:     %% Internal without any header.
 3374:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3375: 			     {notify, true},
 3376: 			     {size, {100, No}}]),
 3377:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 3378:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3379:     ok = disk_log:truncate(n),
 3380:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 3}}),
 3381:     {0, 0} = no_overflows(n),
 3382:     8 = curb(n),
 3383:     1 = curf(n),
 3384:     0 = cur_cnt(n),
 3385:     true = (Size == sz(n)),
 3386: 
 3387:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B]),
 3388:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3389:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3390:     [_, _] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 3391:     del(File, No),
 3392:     Q = qlen(),
 3393:     ok.
 3394: 
 3395: 
 3396: %% Test many users logging and sync:ing at the same time.
 3397: many_users(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3398:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3399:     N = 100,
 3400:     NoClients = 10,
 3401:     Fun1 = fun(Name, Pid, I) -> disk_log:log(Name, {Pid, I}) end,
 3402:     Fun2 = fun(Name, Pid, I) -> ok = disk_log:log(Name, {Pid, I}),
 3403: 				disk_log:sync(Name) end,
 3404:     {C1, T1} = many(Fun2, NoClients, N, halt, internal, infinity, Dir),
 3405:     true = lists:duplicate(NoClients, ok) == C1,
 3406:     true = length(T1) == N*NoClients,
 3407:     {C2, T2} = many(Fun1, NoClients, N, halt, internal, 1000, Dir),
 3408:     true = lists:duplicate(NoClients, {error, {full,"log.LOG"}}) == C2,
 3409:     true = length(T2) > 0,
 3410:     {C3, T3} = many(Fun2, NoClients, N, wrap, internal,
 3411: 		    {300*NoClients,200}, Dir),
 3412:     true = lists:duplicate(NoClients, ok) == C3,
 3413:     true = length(T3) == N*NoClients,
 3414:     ok.
 3415: 
 3416: many(Fun, NoClients, N, Type, Format, Size, Dir) ->
 3417:     Name = "log.LOG",
 3418:     File = filename:join(Dir, Name),
 3419:     del_files(Size, File),
 3420:     Q = qlen(),
 3421:     {ok, _} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,Type}, {size,Size},
 3422: 			     {format,Format}, {file,File}]),
 3423:     Pids = spawn_clients(NoClients, client, [self(), Name, N, Fun]),
 3424:     Checked = check_clients(Pids),
 3425:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
 3426:     Terms = get_all_terms(Name, File, Type),
 3427:     del_files(Size, File),
 3428:     Q = qlen(),
 3429:     {Checked, Terms}.
 3430: 
 3431: spawn_clients(0, _F, _A) ->
 3432:     [];
 3433: spawn_clients(I, F, A) ->
 3434:     [spawn_link(?MODULE, F, A) | spawn_clients(I-1, F, A)].
 3435: 
 3436: check_clients(Pids) ->
 3437:     lists:map(fun(Pid) -> receive {Pid, Reply} -> Reply end end, Pids).
 3438: 
 3439: client(From, _Name, 0, _Fun) ->
 3440:     From ! {self(), ok};
 3441: client(From, Name, N, Fun) ->
 3442:     %% Fun is called N times.
 3443:     case Fun(Name, self(), N) of
 3444: 	ok -> client(From, Name, N-1, Fun);
 3445: 	Else -> From ! {self(), Else}
 3446:     end.
 3447: 
 3448: del_files({_NoBytes,NoFiles}, File) ->
 3449:     del(File, NoFiles);
 3450: del_files(_Size, File) ->
 3451:     file:delete(File).
 3452: 
 3453: 
 3454: 
 3455: 
 3456: %% Test no_current_{bytes, items} as returned by info/0.
 3457: info_current(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3458: 
 3459:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3460:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),

 3464:     SB = mk_bytes(10),  % much smaller than a single wrap log file

 3468:     %% Internal with header.

 3657: 
 3658: change_size_before(doc) -> 
 3659:     ["Change size of a wrap log file before we have reached "
 3660:      "to the file index corresponding to the new size"];
 3661: change_size_before(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3662: 
 3663:     Log_1_1 = "first log  first message",
 3664:     Log_1_2 = "first log  second message",
 3665:     Log_2_1 = "second log  first message",
 3666:     Log_2_2 = "second log  second message",
 3667:     Log_3_1 = "third log  first message",
 3668:     Log_3_2 = "third log  second message",
 3669:     Log_4_1 = "fourth log  first message",
 3670:     Log_4_2 = "fourth log  second message",
 3671:     Log_5_1 = "fifth log  first message",
 3672:     Log_5_2 = "fifth log  second message",
 3673:     Log_1_2_1 = "first log  second round 1",
 3674:     Log_1_2_2 = "first log  second round 2",
 3675: 
 3676: 
 3677:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3678:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 3679:     del(File, 5),
 3680:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File},
 3681: 			     {type, wrap}, {size, {100,5}}]),
 3682:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3683:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3684:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3685:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 3686:     disk_log:change_size(a, {100, 3}),
 3687:     [Log_1_1, Log_1_2,
 3688:      Log_2_1, Log_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3689:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3690:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),
 3691:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2_1),
 3692:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2_2),
 3693:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3694:      Log_3_1, Log_3_2,
 3695:      Log_1_2_1, Log_1_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3696: 
 3697:     disk_log:close(a),
 3698:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3699: 			     {size, {100,3}}]),
 3700:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3701:      Log_3_1, Log_3_2,
 3702:      Log_1_2_1, Log_1_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3703:     disk_log:close(a),
 3704:     del(File, 5),
 3705: 
 3706:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3707: 			     {size, {60,5}}, {format, external}]),
 3708:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_1_1),
 3709:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_1_2),
 3710:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_2_1),
 3711:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_2_2),
 3712:     disk_log:change_size(a, {60, 3}),
 3713:     ok = disk_log:sync(a),
 3714:     {ok, Fd1} = file:open(File ++ ".1", [read]),
 3715:     Log11_12 = Log_1_1 ++ Log_1_2,
 3716:     {ok,Log11_12} = file:read(Fd1, 200),
 3717:     ok = file:close(Fd1),
 3718:     {ok, Fd2} = file:open(File ++ ".2", [read]),
 3719:     Log21_22 = Log_2_1 ++ Log_2_2,
 3720:     {ok,Log21_22} = file:read(Fd2, 200),
 3721:     ok = file:close(Fd2),
 3722:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_3_1),
 3723:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_3_2),
 3724:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_1_2_1),
 3725:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_1_2_2),
 3726:     ok = disk_log:sync(a),
 3727:     {ok, Fd2a} = file:open(File ++ ".2", [read]),
 3728:     {ok,Log21_22} = file:read(Fd2a, 200),
 3729:     ok = file:close(Fd2a),
 3730:     {ok, Fd3a} = file:open(File ++ ".3", [read]),
 3731:     Log31_32 = Log_3_1 ++ Log_3_2,
 3732:     {ok,Log31_32} = file:read(Fd3a, 200),
 3733:     ok = file:close(Fd3a),
 3734:     {ok, Fd1a} = file:open(File ++ ".1", [read]),
 3735:     Log121_122 = Log_1_2_1 ++ Log_1_2_2,
 3736:     {ok,Log121_122} = file:read(Fd1a, 200),
 3737:     ok = file:close(Fd1a),
 3738: 
 3739:     disk_log:close(a),
 3740:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3741: 			     {size, {60,3}}, {format, external}]),
 3742:     {ok, Fd2b} = file:open(File ++ ".2", [read]),
 3743:     {ok,Log21_22} = file:read(Fd2b, 200),
 3744:     ok = file:close(Fd2b),
 3745:     {ok, Fd3b} = file:open(File ++ ".3", [read]),
 3746:     {ok,Log31_32} = file:read(Fd3b, 200),
 3747:     ok = file:close(Fd3b),
 3748:     {ok, Fd1b} = file:open(File ++ ".1", [read]),
 3749:     {ok,Log121_122} = file:read(Fd1b, 200),
 3750:     ok = file:close(Fd1b),
 3751:     disk_log:close(a),
 3752:     del(File, 5),
 3753: 
 3754:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,5}}]),
 3755:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3756:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3757:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3758:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 3759:     disk_log:change_size(a, {60, 3}),
 3760:     [Log_1_1, Log_1_2,
 3761:      Log_2_1, Log_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3762:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3763:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2_1),
 3764:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3765:      Log_3_1,
 3766:      Log_1_2_1] = get_all_terms(a),
 3767: 
 3768:     disk_log:close(a),
 3769:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size, {60,3}}]),
 3770:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3771:      Log_3_1,
 3772:      Log_1_2_1] = get_all_terms(a),
 3773:     disk_log:close(a),
 3774:     del(File, 5),
 3775: 
 3776:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size, {60, 3}}]),
 3777:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3778:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3779:     disk_log:change_size(a, {100, 5}),
 3780:     [Log_1_1,
 3781:      Log_2_1] = get_all_terms(a),
 3782:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),

 3794:      Log_1_2_1] = get_all_terms(a),
 3795:

 3808: %% Change size of a wrap log file while logging to a file index
 3809: %% between the old and the new size.
 3810: change_size_during(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3811: 
 3812:     Log_1_1 = "first log  first message",
 3813:     Log_1_2 = "first log  second message",
 3814:     Log_2_1 = "second log  first message",
 3815:     Log_2_2 = "second log  second message",
 3816:     Log_3_1 = "third log  first message",
 3817:     Log_3_2 = "third log  second message",
 3818:     Log_4_1 = "fourth log  first message",
 3819:     Log_4_2 = "fourth log  second message",
 3820:     Log_5_1 = "fifth log  first message",
 3821:     Log_5_2 = "fifth log  second message",
 3822:     Log_1_2_1 = "first log  second round 1",
 3823:     Log_1_2_2 = "first log  second round 2",
 3824:     Log_2_2_1 = "second log  second round 1",
 3825:     Log_2_2_2 = "second log  second round 2",
 3826:     Log_3_2_1 = "third log  second round 1",
 3827:     Log_3_2_2 = "third log  second round 2",
 3828:     Log_1_3_1 = "first log  third round 1",
 3829:     Log_1_3_2 = "first log  third round 2",
 3830: 
 3831:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3832:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 3833:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,5}}]),
 3834:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3835:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3836:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3837:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 3838:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3839:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),
 3840:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_1),
 3841:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_2),
 3842:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_1),
 3843:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_2),
 3844:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3845:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3846:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3847:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),

 3860:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,

 3864:

 3871:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2_1),

 3873:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2_1),
 3874:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2_2),

 3877:     [Log_2_2_1, Log_2_2_2,

 3880:     disk_log:close(a),

 3882:     [Log_2_2_1, Log_2_2_2,
 3883:      Log_3_2_1, Log_3_2_2,
 3884:      Log_1_3_1, Log_1_3_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3885:     disk_log:close(a),

 3889:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3890:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),

 3939:

 3949:     Log_5_2 = "fifth log  second message",
 3950:     Log_1_2_1 = "first log  second round 1",
 3951:     Log_1_2_2 = "first log  second round 2",
 3952:

 3954:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 3955:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3956: 			     {size, {100,5}}]),

 3999:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 4000:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 4001:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),
 4002:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_1),
 4003:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_2),
 4004:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_1),
 4005:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_2),
