 4033: %% Open an existing wrap log without size option .
 4034: default_size(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4035:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4036:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 4037:     {error, {badarg, size}} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File},
 4038:                                                    {type, wrap}]),
 4039: 
 4040:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4041:                                    {size, {100,5}}]),
 4042:     disk_log:close(a),
 4043: 
 4044:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}]),
 4045:     {100, 5} = disk_log_1:read_size_file(File),
 4046:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
 4047:     del(File, 5).
 4048: 
 4049: %% Testing change_size/2 a bit more...
 4050: change_size2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4051:     
 4052:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4053:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 4054:     No = 4,
 4055:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 4056: 
 4057:     %% External halt.
 4058:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {size, 100000},
 4059:                                    {format, external}, {type, halt}]),
 4060:     B = mk_bytes(60), % 56 actually...
 4061:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [B,list_to_binary(B),B]),
 4062:     Error1 = {error, {new_size_too_small,n,168}} =
 4063:         disk_log:change_size(n, 167),
 4064:     "The current size" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 4065:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, infinity),
 4066:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, 168),
 4067:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4068:     file:delete(File), % cleanup
 4069: 
 4070:     %% External wrap.
 4071:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4072: 				   {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 4073: 				   {format, external}]),
 4074:     BB = mk_bytes(160),
 4075:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB, BB, BB]), % create all files
 4076:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4077:     rec(3, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 4078:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB]),
 4079:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4080:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4081:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, 2}),
 4082:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, 2}),
 4083:     {100, 2} = sz(n),
 4084:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [BB, BB]),
 4085:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [BB]),
 4086:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB]),
 4087:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4088:     rec(4, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4089:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, 4}),
 4090:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4091:     del(File, No),
 4092: 
 4093:     %% Internal wrap.
 4094:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4095: 				   {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 4096: 				   {format, internal}]),
 4097:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB, BB, BB]), % create all files
 4098:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4099:     rec(3, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 4100:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB]),
 4101:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4102:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4103:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, 2}),
 4104:     {100, 2} = sz(n),
 4105:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB, BB, BB]),
 4106:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4107:     rec(4, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4108:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4109:     del(File, No).
 4110: 
 4111: %% OTP-3484: truncating index file.
 4112: change_size_truncate(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4113:     
 4114:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4115:     File = filename:join(Dir, "bert.LOG"),
 4116:     No = 3,
 4117:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 4118: 
 4119:     %% The problem here is truncation of the index file. One cannot easily
 4120:     %% check that the index file is correctly updated, but print_index_file()
 4121:     %% can be used to follow the progress more closely.
 4122: 
 4123:     %% Part 1.
 4124:     %% Change the size immediately after creating the log, while there
 4125:     %% are no log files. This used to write stuff a negative offset
 4126:     %% from the beginning of the file.
 4127:     del(File, No+1),
 4128:     {ok, bert} = disk_log:open([{name,bert}, {type,wrap}, {file, File},
 4129: 				      {notify, true}, {size,{1000,255}}]),
 4130:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,No}),
 4131:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4132:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4133:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4134:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4135:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4136:     3 = curf(bert),
 4137:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4138:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4139:     1 = curf(bert),
 4140:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4141:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4142:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4143:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4144: 
 4145:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4146:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4147:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4148:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4149:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4150:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4151: 
 4152:     %% Three items expected.
 4153:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4154:     3 = curf(bert),
 4155:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,1}),
 4156:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4157:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4158:     %% Three items expected.
 4159:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4160:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4161:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4162:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4163:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4164:     %% One item expected.
 4165:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4166: 
 4167:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4168:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4169:     ok = disk_log:close(bert),
 4170:     del(File, No),
 4171: 
 4172:     %% Part 2.
 4173:     %% Change the size twice, the second time while the the effects of
 4174:     %% the first changed have not yet been handled. Finally close before
 4175:     %% the index file has been truncated.
 4176: 
 4177:     del(File, No),
 4178:     {ok, bert} = disk_log:open([{name,bert}, {type,wrap}, {file, File},
 4179: 				      {notify, true}, {size,{100,No}}]),
 4180:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4181:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4182:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4183:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4184:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4185: 
 4186:     3 = curf(bert),
 4187:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,No-1}),
 4188: 
 4189:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4190:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4191: 
 4192:     1 = curf(bert),
 4193:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,No+1}),
 4194: 
 4195:     %% Three items expected.
 4196:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4197: 
 4198:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4199:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4200: 
 4201:     %% Three items expected.
 4202:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4203: 
 4204:     2 = curf(bert),
 4205:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,1}),
 4206: 
 4207:     %% Three items expected.
 4208:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4209: 
 4210:     ok = disk_log:close(bert),
 4211:     
 4212:     %% State: .siz is 1, current file is 2, index file size is 3...
 4213: 
 4214:     {ok, bert} = disk_log:open([{name,bert}, {file, File},
 4215: 				      {type,wrap}, {notify, true}]),
 4216:     
 4217:     %% Three items expected.
 4218:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4219:     
 4220:     2 = curf(bert),
 4221:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4222:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4223:     ok = disk_log:close(bert),
 4224: 
 4225:     {ok, bert} = disk_log:open([{name,bert}, {file, File},
 4226: 				      {type,wrap}, {notify, true}]),
 4227:     
 4228:     %% Two items expected.
 4229:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4230:     
 4231:     1 = curf(bert),
 4232:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4233:     %% Expect {wrap 0}. Nothing lost now, last wrap notification
 4234:     %% reported one lost item.
 4235:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4236: 
 4237:     %% One item expected.
 4238:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4239:     ok = disk_log:close(bert),
 4240: 
 4241:     del(File, No),
 4242:     ok.
 4243: 
 4244: %% Change notify and head.
 4245: change_attribute(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4246: 
 4247:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4248:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 4249:     No = 4,
 4250:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 4251:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 4252: 
 4253:     Q = qlen(),
 4254: 
 4255:     %% test change_notify
 4256:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4257: 				   {size, {100,No}}]),
 4258:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}]), % ignored...
 4259:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B]),
 4260:     {error, {badarg, notify}} = disk_log:change_notify(n, self(), wrong),
 4261:     ok = disk_log:change_notify(n, self(), false),
 4262:     ok = disk_log:change_notify(n, self(), true),
 4263:     Error1 = {error, {not_owner, _}} =
 4264:         disk_log:change_notify(n, none, true),
 4265:     "The pid" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 4266:     2 = no_written_items(n),
 4267:     0 = users(n),
 4268:     Parent = self(),
 4269:     Pid = spawn(fun() -> disk_log:close(n), Parent ! {self(),done} end),
 4270:     receive {Pid, done} -> ok end,
 4271:     0 = users(n),
 4272:     1 = length(owners(n)),
 4273: 
 4274:     %% test change_header
 4275:     {error, {badarg, head}} = disk_log:change_header(n, none),
 4276:     {error, {badarg, head}} =
 4277: 	disk_log:change_header(n, {head_func, {1,2,3}}),
 4278:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, header}),
 4279:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 4280:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 4281:     4 = no_written_items(n),
 4282:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, none}),
 4283:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 4284:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 4285:     5 = no_written_items(n),
 4286:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n,
 4287: 			     {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,header}]}}),
 4288:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 4289:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4290:     7 = no_written_items(n),
 4291:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4292:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:close(n),
 4293:     del(File, No),
 4294:     file:delete(File), % cleanup
 4295:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {format, external},
 4296: 				   {type, halt}]),
 4297:     {error, {badarg, head}} = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, header}),
 4298:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, "header"}),
 4299:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4300:     file:delete(File),
 4301:     
 4302:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4303: 				   {size, {100,No}}]),
 4304:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4305: 				   {size, {100,No}}]),
 4306:     ok = disk_log:change_notify(n, self(), true),
 4307:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, tjolahopp}),
 4308:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4309: 				   {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true}]),
 4310:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4311:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 4312:     Q = qlen(),
 4313:     del(File, No).
 4314:     
 4315: 
 4316: %% OTP-6278. open/1 creates no status or crash report.
 4317: otp_6278(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4318:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4319:     File = filename:join(Dir, "no_such_dir/no_such_file"),
 4320:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE, self()),
 4321:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} =
 4322:         disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File}]),
 4323:     receive
 4324: 	{crash_report,_Pid,Report} ->
 4325: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p\n", [Report]),
 4326: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 4327:     after 1000 ->
 4328:             ok
 4329:     end,
 4330:     error_logger:delete_report_handler(?MODULE).
 4331: 
 4332: %% OTP-10131. head_func type.
 4333: otp_10131(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4334:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4335:     Log = otp_10131,
 4336:     File = filename:join(Dir, lists:concat([Log, ".LOG"])),
 4337:     HeadFunc = {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head"}]},
 4338:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log},{file,File},
 4339:                                {head_func, HeadFunc}]),
 4340:     HeadFunc = info(Log, head, undef),
 4341:     HeadFunc2 = {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head2"}]},
 4342:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head_func, HeadFunc2}),
 4343:     HeadFunc2 = info(Log, head, undef),
 4344:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 4345:     ok.
 4346: 
 4347: %% OTP-16768. Bad number of items with truncate/1. ERL-1312, ERL-1313.
 4348: otp_16768(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4349:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4350:     Log = otp_16768,
 4351:     File = filename:join(Dir, Log),
 4352:     Header = <<"123456789\n">>,
 4353:     head_count(Log, File, Header, external, 25),
 4354:     head_count(Log, File, none, external, 20),
 4355:     head_count(Log, File, Header, internal, 30),
 4356:     head_count(Log, File, none, internal, 20),
 4357:     ok.
 4358: 
 4359: head_count(Log, File, Header, Format, Expected) ->
 4360:     del(File, 10),
 4361:     Content = <<"1234567890123456789\n">>,
 4362:     HeaderSize = case Header of
 4363:                      none -> 0;
 4364:                      _ -> byte_size(Header)
 4365:                  end,
 4366:     %% 5 files for the external format, more for the internal format
 4367:     MaxSizePerFile = HeaderSize + (5 * byte_size(Content)) - 1,
 4368:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{file, File},
 4369:                                {name, Log},
 4370:                                {format, Format},
 4371:                                {head, Header},
 4372:                                {size, {MaxSizePerFile, 999}},
 4373:                                {type, wrap}
 4374:                               ]),
 4375:     ok = disk_log:truncate(Log),
 4376:     lists:foreach(fun(_I) -> disk_log:blog(Log, Content) end,
 4377:                   lists:seq(1, 20)),
 4378:     DiskLogInfo = disk_log:info(Log),
 4379:     Expected = proplists:get_value(no_items, DiskLogInfo),
 4380:     ok = disk_log:close(Log).
 4381: 
 4382: otp_16809(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4383:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4384:     Log = otp_16809,
 4385:     File = filename:join(Dir, lists:concat([Log, ".LOG"])),
 4386:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log},{file,File}]),
 4387:     none = info(Log, head, undef),
 4388:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head, none}),
 4389:     none = info(Log, head, undef),
 4390:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head, some_header}),
 4391:     %% Notice: the head argument as a binary:
 4392:     true = term_to_binary(some_header) =:= info(Log, head, undef),
 4393:     HeadFunc = {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,a_header}]},
 4394:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head_func, HeadFunc}),
 4395:     HeadFunc = info(Log, head, undef),
 4396:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 4397: 
 4398:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log},
 4399:                                {file,File},
 4400:                                {format,external}]),
 4401:     none = info(Log, head, undef),
 4402:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head, none}),
 4403:     none = info(Log, head, undef),
 4404:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head, "some header"}),
 4405:     %% Notice: the head argument as a binary:
 4406:     <<"some header">> = info(Log, head, undef),
 4407:     HeadFunc2 = {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"a header"}]},
 4408:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head_func, HeadFunc2}),
 4409:     HeadFunc2 = info(Log, head, undef),
 4410:     ok = disk_log:close(Log).
 4411: 
 4412: mark(FileName, What) ->
 4413:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(FileName, [raw, binary, read, write]),
 4414:     {ok,_} = file:position(Fd, 4),
 4415:     ok = file:write(Fd, What),
 4416:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 4417: 
 4418: crash(File, Where) ->
 4419:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read,write]),
 4420:     file:position(Fd, Where),
 4421:     ok = file:write(Fd, [10]),
 4422:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 4423: 
 4424: unwritable(Fname) ->
 4425:     {ok, Info} = file:read_file_info(Fname),
 4426:     Mode = Info#file_info.mode - 8#00200,
 4427:     file:write_file_info(Fname, Info#file_info{mode = Mode}).
 4428: 
 4429: writable(Fname) ->
 4430:     {ok, Info} = file:read_file_info(Fname),
 4431:     Mode = Info#file_info.mode bor 8#00200,
 4432:     file:write_file_info(Fname, Info#file_info{mode = Mode}).
 4433: 
 4434: truncate(File, Where) ->
 4435:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read,write]),
 4436:     file:position(Fd, Where),
 4437:     ok = file:truncate(Fd),
 4438:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 4439: 
 4440: file_size(File) ->
 4441:     {ok, F} = file:read_file_info(File),
 4442:     F#file_info.size.
 4443: 
 4444: copy_wrap_log(FromName, N, FromDir, ToDir) ->
 4445:     copy_wrap_log(FromName, FromName, N, FromDir, ToDir).
 4446: 
 4447: copy_wrap_log(FromName, ToName, N, FromDir, ToDir) ->
 4448:     Fun = fun(E) ->
 4449: 	     From = join(FromDir, io_lib:format("~s.~p", [FromName, E])),
 4450: 	     To = join(ToDir, io_lib:format("~s.~p", [ToName, E])),
 4451: 	     case file:read_file_info(From) of
 4452:                  {ok, _FileInfo} ->
 4453:                      copy_file(From, To);
 4454:                  _Else ->
 4455:                      ok
 4456:              end
 4457: 	  end,
 4458:     Exts = [idx, siz | lists:seq(1, N)],
 4459:     lists:foreach(Fun, Exts).
 4460: 
 4461: -define(BUFSIZE, 8192).
 4462: 
 4463: copy_file(Src, Dest) ->
 4464:     %% io:format("copying from ~p to ~p~n", [Src, Dest]),
 4465:     {ok, InFd} = file:open(Src, [raw, binary, read]),
 4466:     {ok, OutFd} = file:open(Dest, [raw, binary, write]),
 4467:     ok = copy_file1(InFd, OutFd),
 4468:     file:close(InFd),
 4469:     file:close(OutFd),
 4470:     ok = file:change_mode(Dest, 8#0666).
 4471: 
 4472: copy_file1(InFd, OutFd) ->
 4473:     case file:read(InFd, ?BUFSIZE) of
 4474:         {ok, Bin} ->
 4475:             ok = file:write(OutFd, Bin),
 4476:             copy_file1(InFd, OutFd);
 4477:         eof  ->
 4478:             ok
 4479:     end.
 4480: 
 4481: 
 4482: join(A, B) ->
 4483:     filename:nativename(filename:join(A, B)).
 4484: 
 4485: add_ext(Name, Ext) ->
 4486:     lists:concat([Name, ".", Ext]).
 4487: 
 4488: log(_Name, 0) ->
 4489:     ok;
 4490: log(Name, N) ->
 4491:     ok = disk_log:log(Name, "this is a logged message number " ++ 
 4492:                       integer_to_list(N)),
 4493:     log(Name, N-1).
 4494: 
 4495: format_error(E) ->
 4496:     lists:flatten(disk_log:format_error(E)).
 4497: 
 4498: check_pps({Ports0,Procs0} = P0) ->
 4499:     case pps() of
 4500:         P0 ->
 4501:             ok;
 4502:         _ ->
 4503:             timer:sleep(500),
 4504:             case pps() of
 4505:                 P0 ->
 4506:                     ok;
 4507:                 {Ports1,Procs1} = P1 ->
 4508: 		    case {Ports1 -- Ports0, Procs1 -- Procs0} of
 4509: 			{[], []} -> ok;
 4510: 			{PortsDiff,ProcsDiff} ->
 4511: 			    io:format("failure, got ~p~n, expected ~p\n", [P1, P0]),
 4512: 			    show("Old port", Ports0 -- Ports1),
 4513: 			    show("New port", PortsDiff),
 4514: 			    show("Old proc", Procs0 -- Procs1),
 4515: 			    show("New proc", ProcsDiff),
 4516: 			    ct:fail(failed)
 4517: 		    end
 4518: 	    end
 4519:     end.
 4520: 
 4521: show(_S, []) ->
 4522:     ok;
 4523: show(S, [{Pid, Name, InitCall}|Pids]) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 4524:     io:format("~s: ~w (~w), ~w: ~p~n",
 4525:               [S, Pid, proc_reg_name(Name), InitCall,
 4526:                erlang:process_info(Pid)]),
 4527:     show(S, Pids);
 4528: show(S, [{Port, _}|Ports]) when is_port(Port)->
 4529:     io:format("~s: ~w: ~p~n", [S, Port, erlang:port_info(Port)]),
 4530:     show(S, Ports).
 4531: 
 4532: pps() ->
 4533:     timer:sleep(100),
 4534:     {port_list(), process_list()}.
 4535: 
 4536: port_list() ->
 4537:     [{P,safe_second_element(erlang:port_info(P, name))} ||
 4538:         P <- erlang:ports()].
 4539: 
 4540: process_list() ->
 4541:     [{P,process_info(P, registered_name),
 4542:       safe_second_element(process_info(P, initial_call))} ||
 4543:         P <- processes(), erlang:is_process_alive(P)].
 4544: 
 4545: proc_reg_name({registered_name, Name}) -> Name;
 4546: proc_reg_name([]) -> no_reg_name.
 4547: 
 4548: safe_second_element({_,Info}) -> Info;
 4549: safe_second_element(Other) -> Other.
 4550: 
 4551: 
 4552: qlen() ->
 4553:     {_, {_, N}} = lists:keysearch(message_queue_len, 1, process_info(self())),
 4554:     N.
 4555: 
 4556: owners(Log) ->
 4557: %%     io:format("owners ~p~n", [info(Log, owners, -1)]),
 4558:     info(Log, owners, -1).
 4559: users(Log) ->
 4560: %%     io:format("users ~p~n", [info(Log, users, -1)]),
 4561:     info(Log, users, -1).
 4562: status(Log) ->
 4563: %%     io:format("status ~p~n", [info(Log, status, -1)]),
 4564:     info(Log, status, -1).
 4565: no_items(Log) ->
 4566: %%     io:format("no_items ~p~n", [info(Log, no_items, -1)]),
 4567:     info(Log, no_items, -1).
 4568: no_written_items(Log) ->
 4569: %%     io:format("no_written_items ~p~n", [info(Log, no_written_items, -1)]),
 4570:     info(Log, no_written_items, -1).
 4571: sz(Log) -> 
 4572: %%     io:format("sz ~p~n", [info(Log, size, -1)]),
 4573:     info(Log, size, -1).
 4574: curb(Log) -> 
 4575: %%     io:format("curb ~p~n", [info(Log, no_current_bytes, -1)]),
 4576:     info(Log, no_current_bytes, -1).
 4577: curf(Log) -> 
 4578: %%     io:format("curf ~p~n", [info(Log, current_file, -1)]),
 4579:     info(Log, current_file, -1).
 4580: cur_cnt(Log) -> 
 4581: %%     io:format("cur_cnt ~p~n", [info(Log, no_current_items, -1)]),
 4582:     info(Log, no_current_items, -1).
 4583: no_overflows(Log) ->
 4584: %%     io:format("no_overflows ~p~n", [info(Log, no_overflows, -1)]),
 4585:     info(Log, no_overflows, -1).
 4586: 
 4587: info(Log, What, Undef) ->
 4588:     case lists:keysearch(What, 1, disk_log:info(Log)) of
 4589:         {value, {What, Value}} -> Value;
 4590:         false -> Undef
 4591:     end.
 4592: 
 4593: rec(0, _) ->
 4594:      ok;
 4595: rec(N, Msg) ->
 4596:     receive
 4597: 	Msg ->
 4598: 	    rec(N-1, Msg)
 4599:     after 100 ->
 4600: 	    test_server_fail({no_msg, N, Msg})
 4601:     end.
 4602: 
 4603: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 4604: %% The error_logger handler used.
 4605: %% (Copied from stdlib/test/proc_lib_SUITE.erl.)
 4606: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 4607: init(Tester) ->
 4608:     {ok, Tester}.
 4609:     
 4610: handle_event({error_report, _GL, {Pid, crash_report, Report}}, Tester) ->
 4611:     Tester ! {crash_report, Pid, Report},
 4612:     {ok, Tester};
 4613: handle_event({info_msg, _GL, {Pid, F,A}}, Tester) ->
 4614:     Tester ! {info_msg, Pid, F, A},
 4615:     {ok, Tester};
 4616: handle_event(_Event, State) ->
 4617:     {ok, State}.
 4618: 
 4619: handle_info(_, State) ->
 4620:     {ok, State}.
 4621: 
 4622: handle_call(_Query, State) -> {ok, {error, bad_query}, State}.
 4623:
